String.Source: Have a Sim reach max level in the Detective career.
String.Dest: Have a Sim reach max level in the Detective career.

String.Source: Have a Sim reach max level in the Doctor career.
String.Dest: Have a Sim reach max level in the Doctor career.

String.Source: Have a Sim reach max level in the Scientist career.
String.Dest: Have a Sim reach max level in the Scientist career.

String.Source: Perform surgery successfully on an Alien.
String.Dest: Perform surgery successfully on an Alien.

String.Source: Have Sims be abducted by aliens 3 times.
String.Dest: Have Sims be abducted by aliens 3 times.

String.Source: Have a Sim die while running a store.
String.Dest: Have a Sim die while running a store.

String.Source: Have an alien in disguise marry a Sim without them knowing their secret.
String.Dest: Have an alien in disguise marry a Sim without them knowing their secret.

String.Source: Have a male Sim give birth to an Alien baby.
String.Dest: Have a male Sim give birth to an Alien baby.

String.Source: Make a scientific breakthrough while taking a shower.
String.Dest: Make a scientific breakthrough while taking a shower.

String.Source: Have a Sim reach max level in the Baking skill.
String.Dest: Have a Sim reach max level in the Baking skill.

String.Source: Hear Hear! You helped and treated all patients. Pats on the back! You did a great job. Now it's time to go back to work. There are more patients to treat. Click on your Sim and select Return to Hospital to go back to work.
String.Dest: Hear Hear! You helped and treated all patients. Pats on the back! You did a great job. Now it's time to go back to work. There are more patients to treat. Click on your Sim and select Return to Hospital to go back to work.

String.Source: Congratulations! The doctor has prepared the birth certificate.
String.Dest: Congratulations! The doctor has prepared the birth certificate.

String.Source: Nice work! That's one more criminal off the streets. Unfortunately crime never sleeps and we have another case waiting for you. Get the assignment from a computer and get back out there!
String.Dest: Nice work! That's one more criminal off the streets. Unfortunately crime never sleeps and we have another case waiting for you. Get the assignment from a computer and get back out there!

String.Source: This will bring the aliens around; maybe they'll even abduct us!
String.Dest: This will bring the aliens around; maybe they'll even abduct us!

String.Source: This will keep the aliens from abducting us for sure!
String.Dest: This will keep the aliens from abducting us for sure!

String.Source: {0.SimName} is feeling very much under the weather. Better have {M0.him}{F0.her} stay home at this point.
String.Dest: {0.SimName} is feeling very much under the weather. Better have {M0.him}{F0.her} stay home at this point.

String.Source: The suspect has had enough and become unresponsive before you could determine their guilt or innocence. You'll have to let them go for now.
String.Dest: The suspect has had enough and become unresponsive before you could determine their guilt or innocence. You'll have to let them go for now.

String.Source: The suspect appears to be guilty! It's time to put this criminal behind bars.
String.Dest: The suspect appears to be guilty! It's time to put this criminal behind bars.

String.Source: The suspect appears to be innocent and can be released!
String.Dest: The suspect appears to be innocent and can be released!

String.Source:
A suspect fitting the APB description has been spotted in this area!
Ask around to see if anyone can point you toward the suspect.
Use the Notebook to review the suspect description before you make an arrest. If you arrest the wrong person, it won't look good on your record.
String.Dest:
A suspect fitting the APB description has been spotted in this area!
Ask around to see if anyone can point you toward the suspect.
Use the Notebook to review the suspect description before you make an arrest. If you arrest the wrong person, it won't look good on your record.

String.Source: You have processed enough clues to issue an All Points Bulletin (APB). While you have a rough description of the suspect, the more clues you find and process, the more specific the description becomes. When you have a very detailed description of the perp, you will be less likely to arrest an innocent who shares a few similarities with the guilty party.
String.Dest: You have processed enough clues to issue an All Points Bulletin (APB). While you have a rough description of the suspect, the more clues you find and process, the more specific the description becomes. When you have a very detailed description of the perp, you will be less likely to arrest an innocent who shares a few similarities with the guilty party.

String.Source:
At a Crime Scene, you can find clues that will help you track down a suspect.
Investigate damaged or stolen objects and Search for Clues on the ground nearby to uncover more evidence.
Also, talk with Witnesses to get a report about what happened.
String.Dest:
At a Crime Scene, you can find clues that will help you track down a suspect.
Investigate damaged or stolen objects and Search for Clues on the ground nearby to uncover more evidence.
Also, talk with Witnesses to get a report about what happened.

String.Source:
It's time to start fighting crime!
First things first, use a computer to get a case assignment.
String.Dest:
It's time to start fighting crime!
First things first, use a computer to get a case assignment.

String.Source:
There's still a bit more to learn before you'll be ready for your own case.
First, it's time to get out into the community and start building your reputation as a friendly protector or hardened authority figure.
After that, you'll get to take a shot at finding and arresting a suspect.
Get a move on, rookie!
String.Dest:
There's still a bit more to learn before you'll be ready for your own case.
First, it's time to get out into the community and start building your reputation as a friendly protector or hardened authority figure.
After that, you'll get to take a shot at finding and arresting a suspect.
Get a move on, rookie!

String.Source:
Your training is complete and it's time to run your own case.
You'll have to gather evidence, uncover clues, track down your suspect, and get them to confess to their crimes.
This isn't an easy job, but if you do it well, you'll be making the community a safer place for everyone.
Good luck, detective.
String.Dest:
Your training is complete and it's time to run your own case.
You'll have to gather evidence, uncover clues, track down your suspect, and get them to confess to their crimes.
This isn't an easy job, but if you do it well, you'll be making the community a safer place for everyone.
Good luck, detective.

String.Source:
When an officer is on patrol, they can get to know the community and help keep troublemakers in check.
Talk with residents to make a friendly (or mean) impression.
If you see anyone littering or fighting, issue a citation to make sure they obey the law.
String.Dest:
When an officer is on patrol, they can get to know the community and help keep troublemakers in check.
Talk with residents to make a friendly (or mean) impression.
If you see anyone littering or fighting, issue a citation to make sure they obey the law.

String.Source:
Now that you've learned about work out in the world, you should know that there's plenty to do around the station too.
Run criminals through the Booking Station, take Crime Reports from civilians, and get to know your Co-workers.
You can also use the gym upstairs to stay fit or browse the database on a computer to bolster your knowledge of the criminal mind.
String.Dest:
Now that you've learned about work out in the world, you should know that there's plenty to do around the station too.
Run criminals through the Booking Station, take Crime Reports from civilians, and get to know your Co-workers.
You can also use the gym upstairs to stay fit or browse the database on a computer to bolster your knowledge of the criminal mind.

String.Source: Uh… {1.SimName} is definitely NOT from this planet. Not sure what {M1.”It”} {F1.”It”} expects from this hospital visit, but let’s just carry on as if nothing strange is happening…
String.Dest: Uh… {1.SimName} is definitely NOT from this planet. Not sure what {M1.”It”} {F1.”It”} expects from this hospital visit, but let’s just carry on as if nothing strange is happening…

String.Source: The scan is showing all of {1.SimName}’s organs in the wrong places. This could be indicative of a dire medical issue, or a malfunctioning machine. Either way, it is best not mention it until further test are done.
String.Dest: The scan is showing all of {1.SimName}’s organs in the wrong places. This could be indicative of a dire medical issue, or a malfunctioning machine. Either way, it is best not mention it until further test are done.

String.Source: Code Watermelon: "A Pregnant Sim has just arrived at the reception area, ready to give birth! {0.SimFirstName}, please HURRY and prep for Baby delivery. Get her into the first available surgery table to perform the delivery.”
String.Dest: Code Watermelon: "A Pregnant Sim has just arrived at the reception area, ready to give birth! {0.SimFirstName}, please HURRY and prep for Baby delivery. Get her into the first available surgery table to perform the delivery.”

String.Source: Paging {0.SimName}: "The pharmaceutical lab is over-tasked and has sent a batch of confidential tissue samples that require urgent analysis. Please collect the samples from the reception desk for immediate evaluation and data-recording.”
String.Dest: Paging {0.SimName}: "The pharmaceutical lab is over-tasked and has sent a batch of confidential tissue samples that require urgent analysis. Please collect the samples from the reception desk for immediate evaluation and data-recording.”

String.Source: Alert! Aliens have infiltrated these headquarters and are trying to pass themselves as Humans. Very suspicious! Be on the lookout for them and any sabotaged equipment.
String.Dest: Alert! Aliens have infiltrated these headquarters and are trying to pass themselves as Humans. Very suspicious! Be on the lookout for them and any sabotaged equipment.

String.Source: Today is an exciting day, assuming the Electroflux Wormhole Generator is built and operational. We have been given information that a special event is happening on the alien world. We should go check it out and represent our species well!
String.Dest: Today is an exciting day, assuming the Electroflux Wormhole Generator is built and operational. We have been given information that a special event is happening on the alien world. We should go check it out and represent our species well!

String.Source: The laboratory is running low on supplies! You'll need to collect more specimens in order for the lab to continue research. Keep your eyes peeled! But not too peeled.
String.Dest: The laboratory is running low on supplies! You'll need to collect more specimens in order for the lab to continue research. Keep your eyes peeled! But not too peeled.

String.Source: Welcome to FutureSim Labs! You'll be quite busy conducting essential experiments, researching new technology, and maybe even interacting with alien life. It is your job to leverage potent scientific equipment for the purposes of good. We hope. Well, welcome!
String.Dest: Welcome to FutureSim Labs! You'll be quite busy conducting essential experiments, researching new technology, and maybe even interacting with alien life. It is your job to leverage potent scientific equipment for the purposes of good. We hope. Well, welcome!

String.Source: There comes a choice when one must become a benevolent scientician or a malefactor of knowledge. Good and Evil. That sort of thing. Will you help your fellow scientists? Or foil them at every turn?
String.Dest: There comes a choice when one must become a benevolent scientician or a malefactor of knowledge. Good and Evil. That sort of thing. Will you help your fellow scientists? Or foil them at every turn?

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} invented an Electroflux Wormhole Generator. Where could it lead? What is on the other side? Drag the Portal off the Invention Constructor to find out.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} invented an Electroflux Wormhole Generator. Where could it lead? What is on the other side? Drag the Portal off the Invention Constructor to find out.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} invented a Cloning Machine. What can {M0.he}{F0.she} clone? Drag the Cloning Maching off the Invention Constructor, and then drag things onto it and select "Clone Object."
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} invented a Cloning Machine. What can {M0.he}{F0.she} clone? Drag the Cloning Maching off the Invention Constructor, and then drag things onto it and select "Clone Object."

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} invented a Hover Lamp. Turn it on and break the laws of physics! Drag the Hover Lamp off the Invention Constructor and into {0.SimFirstName}'s inventory to carry it around.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} invented a Hover Lamp. Turn it on and break the laws of physics! Drag the Hover Lamp off the Invention Constructor and into {0.SimFirstName}'s inventory to carry it around.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} invented a Momentum Conserver. Turn it on and watch it spin! Drag the Momentum Conserver off the Invention Constructor and into {0.SimFirstName}'s inventory to carry it around.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} invented a Momentum Conserver. Turn it on and watch it spin! Drag the Momentum Conserver off the Invention Constructor and into {0.SimFirstName}'s inventory to carry it around.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} invented a Satellite Dish. What could be out there? Drag the Satellite Dish off the Invention Constructor to find out.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} invented a Satellite Dish. What could be out there? Drag the Satellite Dish off the Invention Constructor to find out.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} invented a SimRay. This device looks like a powerful Freeze ray. Give it a name! Then drag the SimRay off the Invention Constructor and into {0.SimFirstName}'s inventory, then select a Sim you want to Freeze and choose "Freeze Sim." Who knows what other ideas for the SimRay {0.SimFirstName} might have?
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} invented a SimRay. This device looks like a powerful Freeze ray. Give it a name! Then drag the SimRay off the Invention Constructor and into {0.SimFirstName}'s inventory, then select a Sim you want to Freeze and choose "Freeze Sim." Who knows what other ideas for the SimRay {0.SimFirstName} might have?

String.Source: The company is so excited that they gave {0.SimFirstName} a new Alien Portal for the occasion.
String.Dest: The company is so excited that they gave {0.SimFirstName} a new Alien Portal for the occasion.

String.Source: Of course we love throwing Human Parties! Why do you think we're always visiting?
String.Dest: Of course we love throwing Human Parties! Why do you think we're always visiting?

String.Source: Let's get ready to SimRay! It's all about the SimRay today. Be prepared to transform, freeze, control minds, and up your rayness to the max. For science!
String.Dest: Let's get ready to SimRay! It's all about the SimRay today. Be prepared to transform, freeze, control minds, and up your rayness to the max. For science!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has enough clues to issue an APB at the Crime Map. Collecting more clues before issuing an APB will increase your ability to find the suspect.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has enough clues to issue an APB at the Crime Map. Collecting more clues before issuing an APB will increase your ability to find the suspect.

String.Source: A crime photo has been added to your inventory.
String.Dest: A crime photo has been added to your inventory.

String.Source: An evidence sample has been added to your inventory.
String.Dest: An evidence sample has been added to your inventory.

String.Source: A fingerprint sample has been added to your inventory.
String.Dest: A fingerprint sample has been added to your inventory.

String.Source: A witness report has been added to your inventory.
String.Dest: A witness report has been added to your inventory.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has become of Age! {M0.He}{F0.She} can now set {M0.his}{F0.her} own disguise.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has become of Age! {M0.He}{F0.She} can now set {M0.his}{F0.her} own disguise.

String.Source: The Sims were waiting forever for {0.SimFirstName} to answer the House Call, but {M0.he}{F0.she} never showed up. They finally gave up and drove to a different hospital to get treated.
String.Dest: The Sims were waiting forever for {0.SimFirstName} to answer the House Call, but {M0.he}{F0.she} never showed up. They finally gave up and drove to a different hospital to get treated.

String.Source: The Outbreak kept spreading out of control because {0.SimFirstName} never showed up to contain it. Finally, the local government stepped in and contained the disease.
String.Dest: The Outbreak kept spreading out of control because {0.SimFirstName} never showed up to contain it. Finally, the local government stepped in and contained the disease.

String.Source: Looks like something went horribly wrong during synthesis. {0.SimFirstName} better be more careful next time.
String.Dest: Looks like something went horribly wrong during synthesis. {0.SimFirstName} better be more careful next time.

String.Source: Looks like something happened during synthesis. This serum looks a little tainted. {0.SimFirstName} should test it on someone else.
String.Dest: Looks like something happened during synthesis. This serum looks a little tainted. {0.SimFirstName} should test it on someone else.

String.Source: Success! {0.SimFirstName} has successfully created a Serum! Now all that's left to do is test it.
String.Dest: Success! {0.SimFirstName} has successfully created a Serum! Now all that's left to do is test it.

String.Source:
Welcome, {0.SimName}, to a vital and rewarding career in the field of medicine!
Being new to the job, take some time getting familiarized with the location, the people, and the basic responsibilities of the profession. In time, with skill, dedication and a passion to help {M0.his}{F0.her} fellow Sims, {0.SimFirstName} will no doubt go far in {M0.his}{F0.her} career.
String.Dest:
Welcome, {0.SimName}, to a vital and rewarding career in the field of medicine!
Being new to the job, take some time getting familiarized with the location, the people, and the basic responsibilities of the profession. In time, with skill, dedication and a passion to help {M0.his}{F0.her} fellow Sims, {0.SimFirstName} will no doubt go far in {M0.his}{F0.her} career.

String.Source: Someone has called the Hospital asking for a Doctor to come to their house for help. Select the Front Desk to travel to the House Call.
String.Dest: Someone has called the Hospital asking for a Doctor to come to their house for help. Select the Front Desk to travel to the House Call.

String.Source: A virulent disease has broken out nearby! The hospital needs a Doctor to treat the infected! Click on the Front Desk to travel to the Outbreak.
String.Dest: A virulent disease has broken out nearby! The hospital needs a Doctor to treat the infected! Click on the Front Desk to travel to the Outbreak.

String.Source: The retail advertising campaign has ended. Foot traffic to the store will decrease until more advertising is purchased.
String.Dest: The retail advertising campaign has ended. Foot traffic to the store will decrease until more advertising is purchased.

String.Source: Things are alright. Have you ever considered giving us an employee discount?
String.Dest: Things are alright. Have you ever considered giving us an employee discount?

String.Source: This is a pretty nice place to work. It'd be better if there were donuts...
String.Dest: This is a pretty nice place to work. It'd be better if there were donuts...

String.Source: What do you want now? You're interrupting my personal thoughts! Stay out of my head and stop wasting my time!
String.Dest: What do you want now? You're interrupting my personal thoughts! Stay out of my head and stop wasting my time!

String.Source: Everything about work makes me happy. I get warm fuzzies just thinking about it!
String.Dest: Everything about work makes me happy. I get warm fuzzies just thinking about it!

String.Source: I'm fairly happy here. What can I work on to get that next promotion?
String.Dest: I'm fairly happy here. What can I work on to get that next promotion?

String.Source: I wake up every day thinking about ways that I can continue to impress you. I love the challenge of working here!
String.Dest: I wake up every day thinking about ways that I can continue to impress you. I love the challenge of working here!

String.Source: Can't you just leave me alone and let me get through my workday in peace?
String.Dest: Can't you just leave me alone and let me get through my workday in peace?

String.Source: I tell all of my friends that they should try and get hired here. It's the best job I've ever had!
String.Dest: I tell all of my friends that they should try and get hired here. It's the best job I've ever had!

String.Source: You're a terrible boss. I wish that you weren't, but you are. Every day.
String.Dest: You're a terrible boss. I wish that you weren't, but you are. Every day.

String.Source: Mumble mumble... start a fire... At least I'd get to go home for the day. Mumble...
String.Dest: Mumble mumble... start a fire... At least I'd get to go home for the day. Mumble...

String.Source: I've been considering quitting to go work at a call center, if that gives you an inkling of what I think about working here.
String.Dest: I've been considering quitting to go work at a call center, if that gives you an inkling of what I think about working here.

String.Source: Work is what work is... It's just a means to an end for me.
String.Dest: Work is what work is... It's just a means to an end for me.

String.Source: I get up each day, excited to bring joy to shoppers and help them with their purchases.
String.Dest: I get up each day, excited to bring joy to shoppers and help them with their purchases.

String.Source: I guess things are just fine. I come to work, get paid... Yup, that's a job alright.
String.Dest: I guess things are just fine. I come to work, get paid... Yup, that's a job alright.

String.Source: Just let me earn my paycheck and you won't hear any complaints out of me.
String.Dest: Just let me earn my paycheck and you won't hear any complaints out of me.

String.Source: I'm really just here to earn money. I put in the work, you pay me, and we'll get along just fine.
String.Dest: I'm really just here to earn money. I put in the work, you pay me, and we'll get along just fine.

String.Source: I like it here. I just have one request. Could I help you redecorate?
String.Dest: I like it here. I just have one request. Could I help you redecorate?

String.Source: If hating this job could get me promoted, I'd be the CEO!
String.Dest: If hating this job could get me promoted, I'd be the CEO!

String.Source: Things here are great! You're a fantastic boss and I couldn't be happier.
String.Dest: Things here are great! You're a fantastic boss and I couldn't be happier.

String.Source: How am I feeling about my job? Meh!
String.Dest: How am I feeling about my job? Meh!

String.Source: How do I feel? Hrmm... Well, work could be better I suppose. But on the other hand, work could definitely be worse... I guess I'm OK with things just the way they are.
String.Dest: How do I feel? Hrmm... Well, work could be better I suppose. But on the other hand, work could definitely be worse... I guess I'm OK with things just the way they are.

String.Source: This place is pretty good. I have some ideas about how to make it better that I'd really like to share with you.
String.Dest: This place is pretty good. I have some ideas about how to make it better that I'd really like to share with you.

String.Source: Things are OK. You could always pay me more money and see if I improve.
String.Dest: Things are OK. You could always pay me more money and see if I improve.

String.Source: The work here is rewarding. We get along well, and I feel valued. I'm satisfied with that.
String.Dest: The work here is rewarding. We get along well, and I feel valued. I'm satisfied with that.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} looks pretty dissatisfied with {M0.his}{F0.her} job. Give {0.SimPronounObjective} a promotion or give {0.SimPronounObjective} a break and send {0.SimPronounObjective} home early to make {0.SimPronounObjective} more satisfied.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} looks pretty dissatisfied with {M0.his}{F0.her} job. Give {0.SimPronounObjective} a promotion or give {0.SimPronounObjective} a break and send {0.SimPronounObjective} home early to make {0.SimPronounObjective} more satisfied.

String.Source: The store currently has no items for sale. Click on some items in Live Mode to set them as For Sale, or restock any items that were sold previously. Customers will not arrive until you have items for them to buy.
String.Dest: The store currently has no items for sale. Click on some items in Live Mode to set them as For Sale, or restock any items that were sold previously. Customers will not arrive until you have items for them to buy.

String.Source: You don't sound sick! If this continues there will be consequences!
String.Dest: You don't sound sick! If this continues there will be consequences!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has successfully performed a practice examination on a patient. The test results seem valid, but the specific data is a bit over {M0.his}{F0.her} head and will be passed along to a physician for diagnosis. It was a good learning experience, though.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has successfully performed a practice examination on a patient. The test results seem valid, but the specific data is a bit over {M0.his}{F0.her} head and will be passed along to a physician for diagnosis. It was a good learning experience, though.

String.Source: The minimum amount of exam data is in for {1.SimName}. {0.SimName} can try to diagnose {M1.his}{F1.her} ailment at an Exam Bed, or run more tests for a better diagnosis...
String.Dest: The minimum amount of exam data is in for {1.SimName}. {0.SimName} can try to diagnose {M1.his}{F1.her} ailment at an Exam Bed, or run more tests for a better diagnosis...

String.Source: {0.SimName} has enough good examination data to give {1.SimName} a probable diagnosis at an Exam Bed. Further testing could increase {M0.his}{F0.her} predictive accuracy.
String.Dest: {0.SimName} has enough good examination data to give {1.SimName} a probable diagnosis at an Exam Bed. Further testing could increase {M0.his}{F0.her} predictive accuracy.

String.Source: All examination results for {1.SimName} are conclusive! {0.SimName} can now Diagnose {M1.his}{F1.her} ailment at an Exam Bed.
String.Dest: All examination results for {1.SimName} are conclusive! {0.SimName} can now Diagnose {M1.his}{F1.her} ailment at an Exam Bed.

String.Source: While experimenting {0.SimName} acquired some spare parts.
String.Dest: While experimenting {0.SimName} acquired some spare parts.

String.Source: The clue analysis failed to produce any useful information.
String.Dest: The clue analysis failed to produce any useful information.

String.Source: The analysis has produced a useful clue about the crime!
String.Dest: The analysis has produced a useful clue about the crime!

String.Source: While analyzing {1.ObjectName}, {0.SimFirstName} found trace elements of a different material, and separated out: {2.String}
String.Dest: While analyzing {1.ObjectName}, {0.SimFirstName} found trace elements of a different material, and separated out: {2.String}

String.Source: The analysis has yielded useful information about this element.
String.Dest: The analysis has yielded useful information about this element.

String.Source: This analysis may have compromised the value of the flora. {0.SimFirstName} should be more careful next time.
String.Dest: This analysis may have compromised the value of the flora. {0.SimFirstName} should be more careful next time.

String.Source: The analysis has revealed that this flora is of better quality than it first appeared.
String.Dest: The analysis has revealed that this flora is of better quality than it first appeared.

String.Source: The analysis revealed nothing new about this plant.
String.Dest: The analysis revealed nothing new about this plant.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} discovered {M0.he}{F0.she} knows all the traits of {1.SimName}.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} discovered {M0.he}{F0.she} knows all the traits of {1.SimName}.

String.Source: Your recent amorous activity has revealed that {1.SimFirstName} is an Alien!
String.Dest: Your recent amorous activity has revealed that {1.SimFirstName} is an Alien!

String.Source: The SimRay is an extremely powerful device. Use it with extreme caution! Things that you change with this device may never return to their normal form and may be permanent. Do not let this power go to your head!
String.Dest: The SimRay is an extremely powerful device. Use it with extreme caution! Things that you change with this device may never return to their normal form and may be permanent. Do not let this power go to your head!

String.Source: How lucky! Tinkering with the Fixer's Luck Serum has given {0.SimFirstName} the following Upgrade Parts: {2.String}
String.Dest: How lucky! Tinkering with the Fixer's Luck Serum has given {0.SimFirstName} the following Upgrade Parts: {2.String}

String.Source: Hey boss, you've kept me working into overtime on this shift. I need to head home in compliance with the Fair Labor Sim Act.
String.Dest: Hey boss, you've kept me working into overtime on this shift. I need to head home in compliance with the Fair Labor Sim Act.

String.Source: In the midst of a Midlife Crisis, {0.SimFirstName} has decided Photography is {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} thing and wants to do it more often. See {0.SimFirstName}'s Likes in the Simology Panel.
String.Dest: In the midst of a Midlife Crisis, {0.SimFirstName} has decided Photography is {0.SimPronounPossessiveDependent} thing and wants to do it more often. See {0.SimFirstName}'s Likes in the Simology Panel.

String.Source: {1.SimFirstName} provided an account of what they saw.
String.Dest: {1.SimFirstName} provided an account of what they saw.

String.Source: While analyzing, {0.SimFirstName} found a new element: {1.String}
String.Dest: While analyzing, {0.SimFirstName} found a new element: {1.String}

String.Source: This will boost the speed at which your Sim gains Baking Skill while in a Club Gathering
String.Dest: This will boost the speed at which your Sim gains Baking Skill while in a Club Gathering

String.Source:
Additional Employee #1
Unlocks the ability to hire one additional employee within the Manage Employees window.
String.Dest:
Additional Employee #1
Unlocks the ability to hire one additional employee within the Manage Employees window.

String.Source:
Additional Employee #2
Unlocks the ability to hire one additional employee within the Manage Employees window.
String.Dest:
Additional Employee #2
Unlocks the ability to hire one additional employee within the Manage Employees window.

String.Source:
Faster Checkouts (large)
Household members will ring up customers that are ready to purchase an item much faster.
String.Dest:
Faster Checkouts (large)
Household members will ring up customers that are ready to purchase an item much faster.

String.Source:
Faster Checkouts (small)
Household members will ring up customers that are ready to purchase an item a bit faster.
String.Dest:
Faster Checkouts (small)
Household members will ring up customers that are ready to purchase an item a bit faster.

String.Source:
Curious Shopper
Customers will spend more time browsing the items for sale in the store before they decide to leave.
String.Dest:
Curious Shopper
Customers will spend more time browsing the items for sale in the store before they decide to leave.

String.Source:
Serious Shopper
Customers will have a greater desire to purchase an item when they first enter the store.
String.Dest:
Serious Shopper
Customers will have a greater desire to purchase an item when they first enter the store.

String.Source:
Superfluous Surplus
The cost of restocking items is currently reduced for 12 hours. This perk can be repurchased again in the future.
String.Dest:
Superfluous Surplus
The cost of restocking items is currently reduced for 12 hours. This perk can be repurchased again in the future.

String.Source:
Superfluous Surplus
The store's supplier ordered too much inventory, and they're temporarily reducing prices to clear space! The cost of restocking items will be reduced for 12 hours. This perk can be repurchased again in the future.
String.Dest:
Superfluous Surplus
The store's supplier ordered too much inventory, and they're temporarily reducing prices to clear space! The cost of restocking items will be reduced for 12 hours. This perk can be repurchased again in the future.

String.Source:
Cheaper Restocking
Reduces the price of restocking items.
String.Dest:
Cheaper Restocking
Reduces the price of restocking items.

String.Source:
Mega Manager
Management social interactions performed on store employees will have a greater chance of succeeding.
String.Dest:
Mega Manager
Management social interactions performed on store employees will have a greater chance of succeeding.

String.Source:
Slick Salesman
Retail socials used on customers will have a greater chance of succeeding.
String.Dest:
Slick Salesman
Retail socials used on customers will have a greater chance of succeeding.

String.Source:
Instant Restocking
Members of the household will be able to instantly restock items.
String.Dest:
Instant Restocking
Members of the household will be able to instantly restock items.

String.Source:
Provocative Pedestal
Unlocks a new Pedestal object to display various items for sale on. Check the "Retail Items" section of Build Mode.
String.Dest:
Provocative Pedestal
Unlocks a new Pedestal object to display various items for sale on. Check the "Retail Items" section of Build Mode.

String.Source:
Register of Tomorrow
Unlocks the Suros Pecuniary Cash Register; perfect for use in modern, upscale stores. It's the register of tomorrow... today. Check the "Retail Items" section of Build Mode.
String.Dest:
Register of Tomorrow
Unlocks the Suros Pecuniary Cash Register; perfect for use in modern, upscale stores. It's the register of tomorrow... today. Check the "Retail Items" section of Build Mode.

String.Source:
Faster Restocking (large)
Greatly reduces the time it takes members of the household to restock sold items.
String.Dest:
Faster Restocking (large)
Greatly reduces the time it takes members of the household to restock sold items.

String.Source:
Faster Restocking (small)
Slightly reduces the time it takes members of the household to restock sold items.
String.Dest:
Faster Restocking (small)
Slightly reduces the time it takes members of the household to restock sold items.

String.Source:
Snazzy Shirt
Unlocks an additional shirt for men and women that's ideal as an employee uniform.
String.Dest:
Snazzy Shirt
Unlocks an additional shirt for men and women that's ideal as an employee uniform.

String.Source:
Stunning Sign
Unlocks a new sign which can be placed in your store to attract more customers. Check the "Retail Items" section of Build Mode.
String.Dest:
Stunning Sign
Unlocks a new sign which can be placed in your store to attract more customers. Check the "Retail Items" section of Build Mode.

String.Source:
Placard: My First Simoleon
Unlocks a decorative wall object that celebrates the store's initial success. Check the "Retail Items" section of Build Mode.
String.Dest:
Placard: My First Simoleon
Unlocks a decorative wall object that celebrates the store's initial success. Check the "Retail Items" section of Build Mode.

String.Source:
Placard: Fobbs 500
Unlocks a decorative wall object that celebrates the store's ultimate domination of the marketplace. Check the "Retail Items" section of Build Mode.
String.Dest:
Placard: Fobbs 500
Unlocks a decorative wall object that celebrates the store's ultimate domination of the marketplace. Check the "Retail Items" section of Build Mode.

String.Source:
Sure Sale
Unlocks the "Sure Sale" social interaction, which guarantees a customer will purchase an item when used on them.
String.Dest:
Sure Sale
Unlocks the "Sure Sale" social interaction, which guarantees a customer will purchase an item when used on them.

String.Source: Alien conversation is somehow both intuitive and tactile!
String.Dest: Alien conversation is somehow both intuitive and tactile!

String.Source: The fond memories of a home cooked meal, hanging out with friends, and not having to wear this disguise. Feeling homesick is terrible.
String.Dest: The fond memories of a home cooked meal, hanging out with friends, and not having to wear this disguise. Feeling homesick is terrible.

String.Source: It's probably time to rest and recover some brain power.
String.Dest: It's probably time to rest and recover some brain power.

String.Source: Must have been swamp gas refracting off of a weather balloon...
String.Dest: Must have been swamp gas refracting off of a weather balloon...

String.Source: Looking at home through rose colored glasses.
String.Dest: Looking at home through rose colored glasses.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} is filled with unexplained emotion, as if hit by a beam from above.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} is filled with unexplained emotion, as if hit by a beam from above.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} is filled with unexplained drowsiness, as if hit by a beam from above.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} is filled with unexplained drowsiness, as if hit by a beam from above.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} is feeling the aftereffects of a sudden slumber.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} is feeling the aftereffects of a sudden slumber.

String.Source: There is a bad feeling about this...
String.Dest: There is a bad feeling about this...

String.Source: Behaving like the Captain of a space journey.
String.Dest: Behaving like the Captain of a space journey.

String.Source: They saw through my clever disguise.
String.Dest: They saw through my clever disguise.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} had a brilliant breakthrough on the case.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} had a brilliant breakthrough on the case.

String.Source: Looks like it's not "elementary" after all.
String.Dest: Looks like it's not "elementary" after all.

String.Source: It's a good day when you're able to wrap a suspect around your finger in the interrogation room.
String.Dest: It's a good day when you're able to wrap a suspect around your finger in the interrogation room.

String.Source: Unfortunately cleanliness isn't a requirement for being a criminal.
String.Dest: Unfortunately cleanliness isn't a requirement for being a criminal.

String.Source: A new scientific breakthrough. All that ruminating has paid off!
String.Dest: A new scientific breakthrough. All that ruminating has paid off!

String.Source: By Analyzing and Experimenting, your Sim can stretch {M0.his}{F0.her} mind to discover new inventions.
String.Dest: By Analyzing and Experimenting, your Sim can stretch {M0.his}{F0.her} mind to discover new inventions.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has re-newed focus on {M0.his}{F0.her} career after reading-up on the latest advances in medical care.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has re-newed focus on {M0.his}{F0.her} career after reading-up on the latest advances in medical care.

String.Source: Brimming with intellectual energy after contemplating the conundrum of a hovering lamp.
String.Dest: Brimming with intellectual energy after contemplating the conundrum of a hovering lamp.

String.Source: Feeling fine during an interrogation, nothing to worry about here.
String.Dest: Feeling fine during an interrogation, nothing to worry about here.

String.Source: Nothing is quite as stressful as the cold gaze of a detective.
String.Dest: Nothing is quite as stressful as the cold gaze of a detective.

String.Source: Calibrating an Electroflux Wormhole Generator is a great way to grow the brain.
String.Dest: Calibrating an Electroflux Wormhole Generator is a great way to grow the brain.

String.Source: There's someone - or something - on the other side, and making contact put {0.SimFirstName} in a great frame of mind.
String.Dest: There's someone - or something - on the other side, and making contact put {0.SimFirstName} in a great frame of mind.

String.Source: While experimenting, you have discovered some interesting data.
String.Dest: While experimenting, you have discovered some interesting data.

String.Source: These toxic fumes will make anyone loopy.
String.Dest: These toxic fumes will make anyone loopy.

String.Source: Failing an experiment can be extremely frustrating!
String.Dest: Failing an experiment can be extremely frustrating!

String.Source: Focused technical optimization yields increased confidence in ensuing results
String.Dest: Focused technical optimization yields increased confidence in ensuing results

String.Source: Studying the motion of the planets brings a keen sense of focus.
String.Dest: Studying the motion of the planets brings a keen sense of focus.

String.Source: Whatever it is, it's about to come out!
String.Dest: Whatever it is, it's about to come out!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} isn't feeling so hot. It must be something {M0.he}{F0.she} ate.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} isn't feeling so hot. It must be something {M0.he}{F0.she} ate.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has put on quite a few pounds. Surely this is just a phase.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has put on quite a few pounds. Surely this is just a phase.

String.Source: Something is definitely not right! {0.SimFirstName}'s changing body has left {M0.him}{F0.her} quite suspicious.
String.Dest: Something is definitely not right! {0.SimFirstName}'s changing body has left {M0.him}{F0.her} quite suspicious.

String.Source: This neon sign has seen better days... Time to repair it.
String.Dest: This neon sign has seen better days... Time to repair it.

String.Source: Nothing gets the blood boiling like being poked and prodded on an alien ship!
String.Dest: Nothing gets the blood boiling like being poked and prodded on an alien ship!

String.Source: Whatever those aliens did really messes with the head!
String.Dest: Whatever those aliens did really messes with the head!

String.Source: Seeing all that amazing alien technology truly boggles the mind... even when it's being used on you!
String.Dest: Seeing all that amazing alien technology truly boggles the mind... even when it's being used on you!

String.Source: I'm so lonely... my social is decaying.
String.Dest: I'm so lonely... my social is decaying.

String.Source: Don't bet on anything going right.
String.Dest: Don't bet on anything going right.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} is feeling HOT! Hot as in hot and bothered, but also hot like ACTUALLY SETTING THINGS ON FIRE!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} is feeling HOT! Hot as in hot and bothered, but also hot like ACTUALLY SETTING THINGS ON FIRE!

String.Source: My achy breaky heart. This is not the time to be romantic.
String.Dest: My achy breaky heart. This is not the time to be romantic.

String.Source: Do You Know Who I Am?
String.Dest: Do You Know Who I Am?

String.Source: Can only be cured by more cowbell.
String.Dest: Can only be cured by more cowbell.

String.Source: You're so lucky you get extra salvage parts from Tinkering or Salvaging Parts, and you can repair things lighting-quick.
String.Dest: You're so lucky you get extra salvage parts from Tinkering or Salvaging Parts, and you can repair things lighting-quick.

String.Source: Is there anything that could be more angry than 1000 angry oxen?
String.Dest: Is there anything that could be more angry than 1000 angry oxen?

String.Source: Nothing says feeling better quite like not actually feeling better.
String.Dest: Nothing says feeling better quite like not actually feeling better.

String.Source: Seems like no matter how much you eat, the hunger remains.
String.Dest: Seems like no matter how much you eat, the hunger remains.

String.Source: Smelling so good that Sims can't stop flirting.
String.Dest: Smelling so good that Sims can't stop flirting.

String.Source: It's clear that when drinking serums, bad plus bad equals much more bad.
String.Dest: It's clear that when drinking serums, bad plus bad equals much more bad.

String.Source: Immortality. The best use of science!
String.Dest: Immortality. The best use of science!

String.Source: The key to hiding is not being seen.
String.Dest: The key to hiding is not being seen.

String.Source: Great patient care braises the right (and left) cardiac ventricles.
String.Dest: Great patient care braises the right (and left) cardiac ventricles.

String.Source: Confused by the medical data, {0.SimFirstName} may need a second opinion on "how not to be a bad doctor."
String.Dest: Confused by the medical data, {0.SimFirstName} may need a second opinion on "how not to be a bad doctor."

String.Source: Renewed energy and thoroughly scrubbed genetic material are two benefits {0.SimFirstName} has gained from being decontaminated.
String.Dest: Renewed energy and thoroughly scrubbed genetic material are two benefits {0.SimFirstName} has gained from being decontaminated.

String.Source: Sometimes simple home remedies are the best medicine.
String.Dest: Sometimes simple home remedies are the best medicine.

String.Source: There's a party inside {0.SimFirstName}'s face, with the sole intent of trashing the place.
String.Dest: There's a party inside {0.SimFirstName}'s face, with the sole intent of trashing the place.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} can't tell if it's {M0.him}{F0.her}, or the rest of the world that's spinning.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} can't tell if it's {M0.him}{F0.her}, or the rest of the world that's spinning.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} is hot, like super-hot, and not that good, ready-for-{M0.his}{F0.her}-close-up kinda way.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} is hot, like super-hot, and not that good, ready-for-{M0.his}{F0.her}-close-up kinda way.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} is fighting a battle of the belly... and losing epically.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} is fighting a battle of the belly... and losing epically.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName}'s head is a little like a teapot: short, stout and all steamed up!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName}'s head is a little like a teapot: short, stout and all steamed up!

String.Source: Uncontrollable laughs are only funny for so long.
String.Dest: Uncontrollable laughs are only funny for so long.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName}'s brain feels about 3 1/2 sizes too large for the head-space provided.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName}'s brain feels about 3 1/2 sizes too large for the head-space provided.

String.Source: It feels as if there is a swarm of invisible insects marching all over {0.SimFirstName}'s skin.
String.Dest: It feels as if there is a swarm of invisible insects marching all over {0.SimFirstName}'s skin.

String.Source: Seeing stars is usually a good thing, except when you're the only one that does.
String.Dest: Seeing stars is usually a good thing, except when you're the only one that does.

String.Source: The sudden lack of symptoms and potency of the medication has given {0.SimFirstName} a brief burst of curative energy
String.Dest: The sudden lack of symptoms and potency of the medication has given {0.SimFirstName} a brief burst of curative energy

String.Source: This is {0.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} on prescription drugs. Any questions?
String.Dest: This is {0.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} on prescription drugs. Any questions?

String.Source: This Sim has been frozen. Yes, very much so.
String.Dest: This Sim has been frozen. Yes, very much so.

String.Source: Time to clean, time to clean. Where can I find more dirt?
String.Dest: Time to clean, time to clean. Where can I find more dirt?

String.Source: Mmmm... Food sounds good. Very good.
String.Dest: Mmmm... Food sounds good. Very good.

String.Source: Standing is just too much work. Plus, chairs are pretty.
String.Dest: Standing is just too much work. Plus, chairs are pretty.

String.Source: I love beds. I should sleep.
String.Dest: I love beds. I should sleep.

String.Source: That invention is so deliciously entertaining.
String.Dest: That invention is so deliciously entertaining.

String.Source: Sometimes a different perspective is just what you need.
String.Dest: Sometimes a different perspective is just what you need.

String.Source: These images seem like something from another world. Could it be?
String.Dest: These images seem like something from another world. Could it be?

String.Source: Bathing in the moonlight makes {0.SimFirstName} feel at home!
String.Dest: Bathing in the moonlight makes {0.SimFirstName} feel at home!

String.Source: I Fell Down, A Wellness Center
String.Dest: I Fell Down, A Wellness Center

String.Source: Duty calls! The world is a never-ending cesspool of grime & crime and it’s time for {0.SimFirstName} to take a big bite out of it! Sounds gross. Care to join them or should they go to work alone?
String.Dest: Duty calls! The world is a never-ending cesspool of grime & crime and it’s time for {0.SimFirstName} to take a big bite out of it! Sounds gross. Care to join them or should they go to work alone?

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} did an Adequate Job today. Adding a little more shine to the badge and pep in the step might help.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} did an Adequate Job today. Adding a little more shine to the badge and pep in the step might help.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} did a Fantastic Job today. There may be a shinier badge and new title in {M0.his}{F0.her} future...
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} did a Fantastic Job today. There may be a shinier badge and new title in {M0.his}{F0.her} future...

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} did a Good Job today. The citizens of this community will surely appreciate {M0.his}{F0.her} desire to protect and serve!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} did a Good Job today. The citizens of this community will surely appreciate {M0.his}{F0.her} desire to protect and serve!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} did a Terrible Job today. Crime will surely flourish due to such negligence.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} did a Terrible Job today. Crime will surely flourish due to such negligence.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} did a Terrible Job today. Hopefully no patients suffered due to {M0.his}{F0.her} negligence.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} did a Terrible Job today. Hopefully no patients suffered due to {M0.his}{F0.her} negligence.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} did an Adequate Job today. Preventative care is the best course, so {M0.he}{F0.she} needs to step up!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} did an Adequate Job today. Preventative care is the best course, so {M0.he}{F0.she} needs to step up!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} did a Fantastic Job today. Promotions and community health are surely in the future!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} did a Fantastic Job today. Promotions and community health are surely in the future!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} did a Good Job today. {M0.He}{F0.She} can really turn this clinic into a beacon for the community!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} did a Good Job today. {M0.He}{F0.She} can really turn this clinic into a beacon for the community!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} did an Adequate Job today. The beaker was half full. That can be said at least.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} did an Adequate Job today. The beaker was half full. That can be said at least.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} did a Fantastic Job today. It won’t be long before academic prestige and scientific achievements arrive!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} did a Fantastic Job today. It won’t be long before academic prestige and scientific achievements arrive!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} did a Good Job today. Discoveries and industrious science were made aplenty!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} did a Good Job today. Discoveries and industrious science were made aplenty!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} did a Terrible Job today. Let’s all hope no lab experiments exploded and no extra-terrestrials infiltrated the neighborhood.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} did a Terrible Job today. Let’s all hope no lab experiments exploded and no extra-terrestrials infiltrated the neighborhood.

String.Source: Aiming to become a Doctor? Well it all starts with patient care. Even powerful physicians started by making beds, delivering food and listening to sick Sims’ woes.
String.Dest: Aiming to become a Doctor? Well it all starts with patient care. Even powerful physicians started by making beds, delivering food and listening to sick Sims’ woes.

String.Source: In addition to the basics of health-care, aspiring medical professionals must know the ins-and-outs of the hospital venue. For example, in with new patients, and out with the messes they create.
String.Dest: In addition to the basics of health-care, aspiring medical professionals must know the ins-and-outs of the hospital venue. For example, in with new patients, and out with the messes they create.

String.Source: X-Ray Machines are now available for use at work to scan and exam patients
String.Dest: X-Ray Machines are now available for use at work to scan and exam patients

String.Source: Being exposed to a variety of illnesses does have its benefits... You may be perpetually covered in germs, but you also now know what to look for in your patient examinations.
String.Dest: Being exposed to a variety of illnesses does have its benefits... You may be perpetually covered in germs, but you also now know what to look for in your patient examinations.

String.Source: Medical Treadmills can now be used to further examine patients' conditions
String.Dest: Medical Treadmills can now be used to further examine patients' conditions

String.Source: One of the best parts of working in the medical field, is the ability to “play” around with all the nifty examination gadgets, like X-ray machines and medical treadmills. Playing in the name of health-care, of course.
String.Dest: One of the best parts of working in the medical field, is the ability to “play” around with all the nifty examination gadgets, like X-ray machines and medical treadmills. Playing in the name of health-care, of course.

String.Source: Surgery Tables at work can now be used to treat the most severe patient conditions
String.Dest: Surgery Tables at work can now be used to treat the most severe patient conditions

String.Source: Entering into a nursing role, you have the widest and most vital range of responsibilities. A workday can consist of quality patient care, operating an array medical technology and maintaining good sanitary conditions around the hospital.
String.Dest: Entering into a nursing role, you have the widest and most vital range of responsibilities. A workday can consist of quality patient care, operating an array medical technology and maintaining good sanitary conditions around the hospital.

String.Source: Your commitment to health-care is second to none. As a result, you have risen to the indispensable role of nursing leadership. High-ranking doctors may have great theoretical knowledge of treatment, but the hospital would certainly grind to a halt without your practiced supervision.
String.Dest: Your commitment to health-care is second to none. As a result, you have risen to the indispensable role of nursing leadership. High-ranking doctors may have great theoretical knowledge of treatment, but the hospital would certainly grind to a halt without your practiced supervision.

String.Source: You’ve made it! After immeasurable days and focused effort, you’re officially a primary care physician. However, being a generalist is just the first step along an elite and illustrious path of medical specialization.
String.Dest: You’ve made it! After immeasurable days and focused effort, you’re officially a primary care physician. However, being a generalist is just the first step along an elite and illustrious path of medical specialization.

String.Source: Going beyond the routine duties of a general physician, you have begun to specialize in expert care of patients; everything from treating their most severe conditions to bringing new Sim life into the world.
String.Dest: Going beyond the routine duties of a general physician, you have begun to specialize in expert care of patients; everything from treating their most severe conditions to bringing new Sim life into the world.

String.Source: As a Surgeon, you hold life-and-death of your Sim-charges in steady, skilled hands. Nothing in the practice of medicine is beyond your ability. As such, few other professionals are as deservingly revered and celebrated as those in your elite role.
String.Dest: As a Surgeon, you hold life-and-death of your Sim-charges in steady, skilled hands. Nothing in the practice of medicine is beyond your ability. As such, few other professionals are as deservingly revered and celebrated as those in your elite role.

String.Source: You’ve reached the rarified heights of your profession and are the pinnacle of expert medical knowledge and training. Your lucrative talents are wasted on all but the biggest challenges of theoretical diagnostics and overseeing the entire hospital complex.
String.Dest: You’ve reached the rarified heights of your profession and are the pinnacle of expert medical knowledge and training. Your lucrative talents are wasted on all but the biggest challenges of theoretical diagnostics and overseeing the entire hospital complex.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName}'s dreaming of a life fighting crime and solving cases. But, you have to learn to walk before you can run. {M0.His}{F0.Her} responsibilities as a Cadet are to first assist other detectives with their case work.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName}'s dreaming of a life fighting crime and solving cases. But, you have to learn to walk before you can run. {M0.His}{F0.Her} responsibilities as a Cadet are to first assist other detectives with their case work.

String.Source: The training wheels are off. {0.SimFirstName} is a full fledged officer of the law.
String.Dest: The training wheels are off. {0.SimFirstName} is a full fledged officer of the law.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has proven worthy of the title Corporal. Keep up the good work.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has proven worthy of the title Corporal. Keep up the good work.

String.Source: Will you aspire to be the best of the best like Holmes? Or more of a Clouseau? Only time will tell.
String.Dest: Will you aspire to be the best of the best like Holmes? Or more of a Clouseau? Only time will tell.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has proven very capable and has achieved the rank of Senior Detective. Leave no stone unturned in your investigations.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has proven very capable and has achieved the rank of Senior Detective. Leave no stone unturned in your investigations.

String.Source: Sergeant: Latin for "one who serves." When you are face to face with the scum of the earth day in and day out, it's easy to lose faith in humanity. Remember there are good people out there worth helping.
String.Dest: Sergeant: Latin for "one who serves." When you are face to face with the scum of the earth day in and day out, it's easy to lose faith in humanity. Remember there are good people out there worth helping.

String.Source: Lieutenant {0.SimLastName}. Are you in the pocket of your superiors? Or will you align with your subordinates and facilitate some real, honest police work?
String.Dest: Lieutenant {0.SimLastName}. Are you in the pocket of your superiors? Or will you align with your subordinates and facilitate some real, honest police work?

String.Source: Oh captain! My captain! At least the fellas didn't wait until your passing to write a poem about you. Hopefully the next one will be suitable outside of a restroom wall.
String.Dest: Oh captain! My captain! At least the fellas didn't wait until your passing to write a poem about you. Hopefully the next one will be suitable outside of a restroom wall.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has become an indispensable part of law enforcement. Juke the stats? Or play is straight, colonel?
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has become an indispensable part of law enforcement. Juke the stats? Or play is straight, colonel?

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName}'s has climbed to the top. Chief. That has a nice ring to it. But, don't let your senses dull or get too comfortable behind a desk. Get out there and lead by example!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName}'s has climbed to the top. Chief. That has a nice ring to it. But, don't let your senses dull or get too comfortable behind a desk. Get out there and lead by example!

String.Source: Want to be a scientist you say? Everyone needs to start somewhere. Learning the ins and the outs of the science lab is always a great start.
String.Dest: Want to be a scientist you say? Everyone needs to start somewhere. Learning the ins and the outs of the science lab is always a great start.

String.Source: We know there are unidentified lifeforms living amongst us. They may hold the technology that will accelerate FutureSim Labs leaps and bounds beyond the competition. It's up to you to discover it.
String.Dest: We know there are unidentified lifeforms living amongst us. They may hold the technology that will accelerate FutureSim Labs leaps and bounds beyond the competition. It's up to you to discover it.

String.Source: Time to stretch your mind and think outside the box. FutureSim Labs only employs the most creative minds to create the next big thing in science.
String.Dest: Time to stretch your mind and think outside the box. FutureSim Labs only employs the most creative minds to create the next big thing in science.

String.Source: Stingrams, Ploobits, Quamarts, and Grooflets. Only a true tinkerer can see the hidden potential of these parts.
String.Dest: Stingrams, Ploobits, Quamarts, and Grooflets. Only a true tinkerer can see the hidden potential of these parts.

String.Source: Liquids, Powders, and Boom! Creating new serums can be fun, but combining their effects can be out of this world!
String.Dest: Liquids, Powders, and Boom! Creating new serums can be fun, but combining their effects can be out of this world!

String.Source: As the Research and Development Lead, it is up to you to make sure FutureSim Labs stays at the forefront of scientific innovation.
String.Dest: As the Research and Development Lead, it is up to you to make sure FutureSim Labs stays at the forefront of scientific innovation.

String.Source: Top secret studies have shown that alien life amongst us could be a possibility. Before we can completely confirm these claims we need more proof!
String.Dest: Top secret studies have shown that alien life amongst us could be a possibility. Before we can completely confirm these claims we need more proof!

String.Source: As you move up the ranks at FutureSim Labs you start to take on more responsibilities. Now you have the power to give orders to Co-workers!
String.Dest: As you move up the ranks at FutureSim Labs you start to take on more responsibilities. Now you have the power to give orders to Co-workers!

String.Source: You have proven your worth at FutureSim Labs. Because of your hard work, we are now at the forefront of technological innovation. It is your job now to make sure we do not fall behind.
String.Dest: You have proven your worth at FutureSim Labs. Because of your hard work, we are now at the forefront of technological innovation. It is your job now to make sure we do not fall behind.

String.Source: There comes a time in every scientist life when they must decide whether to use their knowledge for good or for evil. This path is never a clear one, this path is chosen based upon your everyday actions!
String.Dest: There comes a time in every scientist life when they must decide whether to use their knowledge for good or for evil. This path is never a clear one, this path is chosen based upon your everyday actions!

String.Source: Who doesn’t want to be held responsible for another Sim’s health and well-being? A Doctor who can advance in the medical ranks will find themselves rewarded with objects like a Standing Surgical Light and a Full-Sized Skeleton to brighten up the home nursery. To make the deal extra sweet, you’ll be able to unlock your very own Hospital Scrubs and Patient Gowns so you can play Doctor at home!
String.Dest: Who doesn’t want to be held responsible for another Sim’s health and well-being? A Doctor who can advance in the medical ranks will find themselves rewarded with objects like a Standing Surgical Light and a Full-Sized Skeleton to brighten up the home nursery. To make the deal extra sweet, you’ll be able to unlock your very own Hospital Scrubs and Patient Gowns so you can play Doctor at home!

String.Source: Do you want to be the type of cop who’s never really off-duty? If so, this job’s for you and we’ve got the rewards to support that unhealthy lifestyle! Unlock outfits like your Police Uniform to wear as pajamas. Teach your teen a valuable lesson for that C+ by dressing them in Prisoner Coveralls and transforming their bedroom into a virtual jail cell complete with Prison Bar Walls and a decorative Security Camera. As a bonus, you can keep an eye on them with your very own One-Way Mirror.
String.Dest: Do you want to be the type of cop who’s never really off-duty? If so, this job’s for you and we’ve got the rewards to support that unhealthy lifestyle! Unlock outfits like your Police Uniform to wear as pajamas. Teach your teen a valuable lesson for that C+ by dressing them in Prisoner Coveralls and transforming their bedroom into a virtual jail cell complete with Prison Bar Walls and a decorative Security Camera. As a bonus, you can keep an eye on them with your very own One-Way Mirror.

String.Source: Calling all brains! Are you the nerdy type who aspires to one day wear tin foil on your head and decorate your studio with huge bubbly tanks? A Scientist who proves they’ve got the gray matter to change the world as we know it can unlock new outfits like the UFO hunter or objects like a swanky Chemistry Lab for concocting new inventions and serums.
String.Dest: Calling all brains! Are you the nerdy type who aspires to one day wear tin foil on your head and decorate your studio with huge bubbly tanks? A Scientist who proves they’ve got the gray matter to change the world as we know it can unlock new outfits like the UFO hunter or objects like a swanky Chemistry Lab for concocting new inventions and serums.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName}’s hospital shift is starting now. Care to join {M0.him}{F0.her} or should {0.SimFirstName} go to work alone?
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName}’s hospital shift is starting now. Care to join {M0.him}{F0.her} or should {0.SimFirstName} go to work alone?

String.Source: Trusty Notepad in hand, it’s time for {0.SimFirstName} to go work at the Lab. Maybe today is the day for a major breakthrough!? Care to join them or should they go to work alone?
String.Dest: Trusty Notepad in hand, it’s time for {0.SimFirstName} to go work at the Lab. Maybe today is the day for a major breakthrough!? Care to join them or should they go to work alone?

String.Dest: What are my thoughts on aliens?

String.Source: An out of this world experience, literally.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} made it to the curious world of Sixam. What a feat!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} made it to the curious world of Sixam. What a feat!

String.Source: With clear walls but sturdy construction. This fence will entice shoppers to come in your store and buy all the things inside. You can also use in your lot to provide your home with a flair or modernity worthy of Simchectural Digest.
String.Dest: With clear walls but sturdy construction. This fence will entice shoppers to come in your store and buy all the things inside. You can also use in your lot to provide your home with a flair or modernity worthy of Simchectural Digest.

String.Source: Built from sturdy nylon roping and even sturdier plastic posts, placing this specialized indoor fencing just screams "form a line here." No unruly Sims or out-of-control mobs to be seen here. No, no. You made a line.
String.Dest: Built from sturdy nylon roping and even sturdier plastic posts, placing this specialized indoor fencing just screams "form a line here." No unruly Sims or out-of-control mobs to be seen here. No, no. You made a line.

String.Source: This railing should keep you from falling over the edge into a vat of questionable liquid and turning into a supervillain. Unless of course, you’re into that – in which case we included some large spacing between the bars.
String.Dest: This railing should keep you from falling over the edge into a vat of questionable liquid and turning into a supervillain. Unless of course, you’re into that – in which case we included some large spacing between the bars.

String.Source: This formidable fence puts its best foot forward to maintain maxmium security; however, what many Sims don't realize until it's too late, is that this fence isn't designed to keep others out. It's meant to make sure things stay IN.
String.Dest: This formidable fence puts its best foot forward to maintain maxmium security; however, what many Sims don't realize until it's too late, is that this fence isn't designed to keep others out. It's meant to make sure things stay IN.

String.Source: For Your Protection Chain Link Fence
String.Dest: For Your Protection Chain Link Fence

String.Source: Made from reinforced steel, this honeycomb design helps make any police station feel safe, while maintaining a modicum of modernity.
String.Dest: Made from reinforced steel, this honeycomb design helps make any police station feel safe, while maintaining a modicum of modernity.

String.Source: "Can't Find Anything On This" Linoleum Floor
String.Dest: "Can't Find Anything On This" Linoleum Floor

String.Source: This ultra advanced piece of technology allows brave Sims to travel to an alien world filled with exotic and interesting things. Hopefully, you can find a way back home once you go through.
String.Dest: This ultra advanced piece of technology allows brave Sims to travel to an alien world filled with exotic and interesting things. Hopefully, you can find a way back home once you go through.

String.Source: The awning is the ideal architectural landmark that allows sweet storied moments such as: The goodbye, hopefully with a kiss, or the greeting, ideally with a firm handshake. Why settle for grand alohas under anything less than the Falutenous Awning?
String.Dest: The awning is the ideal architectural landmark that allows sweet storied moments such as: The goodbye, hopefully with a kiss, or the greeting, ideally with a firm handshake. Why settle for grand alohas under anything less than the Falutenous Awning?

String.Source: Get ready to adorn the walls of your very own brick and mortar with this fun and whimsical awning! With its multiple color options you can make your walls look like a candy cane or maybe a zebra!
String.Dest: Get ready to adorn the walls of your very own brick and mortar with this fun and whimsical awning! With its multiple color options you can make your walls look like a candy cane or maybe a zebra!

String.Source: A sleek and stunning bassinet to hold your precious. Comes with a padded mattress and hi-tech poop resistant sheet to keep the little one comfortable. *As seen on TV*
String.Dest: A sleek and stunning bassinet to hold your precious. Comes with a padded mattress and hi-tech poop resistant sheet to keep the little one comfortable. *As seen on TV*

String.Source: A perfect vessel for your own bundle of joy.
String.Dest: A perfect vessel for your own bundle of joy.

String.Source: An expectant vessel. Waiting, watching as babies come to life and to keep them safe and sound.
String.Dest: An expectant vessel. Waiting, watching as babies come to life and to keep them safe and sound.

String.Source: Stark, plain, and awfully uncomfortable, it is hard to tell if this mattress is merely firm or stuffed with rocks.
String.Dest: Stark, plain, and awfully uncomfortable, it is hard to tell if this mattress is merely firm or stuffed with rocks.

String.Source:
By: The Swedish Chef
Most expert bakers believe that once the baked good is in the oven, your job is done. What they don't know is that there is a secret science to the act of waiting for a baked good to finish. A secret only The Swedish Chef knew...until now! Learn more about this amazing secret inside!
String.Dest:
By: The Swedish Chef
Most expert bakers believe that once the baked good is in the oven, your job is done. What they don't know is that there is a secret science to the act of waiting for a baked good to finish. A secret only The Swedish Chef knew...until now! Learn more about this amazing secret inside!

String.Source:
By: Frank Oz
Nailing down the ideal shape for a baked good can be a tricky endeavor. Should this cookie be a circle? Triangle? Tetrahedron? Frank Oz explains the optimal shape for a variety of baked goods using a formula he created himself. Read on to discover the mathematical formula that's rocking the world of modern baking!
String.Dest:
By: Frank Oz
Nailing down the ideal shape for a baked good can be a tricky endeavor. Should this cookie be a circle? Triangle? Tetrahedron? Frank Oz explains the optimal shape for a variety of baked goods using a formula he created himself. Read on to discover the mathematical formula that's rocking the world of modern baking!

String.Source: In the time of glorious Emperors, few of whom could read, there was one that had a spine…of a book! Libraer championed books throughout the Empire, though was a poor architect, which is why we celebrate with this IV best shelving apparatus.
String.Dest: In the time of glorious Emperors, few of whom could read, there was one that had a spine…of a book! Libraer championed books throughout the Empire, though was a poor architect, which is why we celebrate with this IV best shelving apparatus.

String.Source: Antique? Sophisticated? Modern? Not for you! You just want a place to store stuff, no nonsense, no floral mumbo jumbo, no flair, glitz, or glam. The Rectangle with Shelves Bookshelf is perfect for those who don't have time for complicated furniture to have a work appropriate environment.
String.Dest: Antique? Sophisticated? Modern? Not for you! You just want a place to store stuff, no nonsense, no floral mumbo jumbo, no flair, glitz, or glam. The Rectangle with Shelves Bookshelf is perfect for those who don't have time for complicated furniture to have a work appropriate environment.

String.Source: True bibliophiles will swoon over the sturdy construction and sleek design of this bookcase. Stack them side by side to create aisles of beloved best sellers.
String.Dest: True bibliophiles will swoon over the sturdy construction and sleek design of this bookcase. Stack them side by side to create aisles of beloved best sellers.

By: Bill Barretta
Never before has pouring several things into a bowl and stirring with a mixer been as carefully explained as Bill Barretta has done with this instructional book. A must have paperweight for any new baker!

String.Source: The bars on this wall are made of titanium and dolemite. Making these some of the strongest bars on the lot! Create a compound on your lot that is impervious to other Sims but also keeps your Sims securely inside. Very securely!

String.Source: We heard your feedback and we delivered! Super reinforced bars, semi-artistic tile pattern, this model is definitely for you if you want to make sure your prisoner stays put for life!
String.Dest: We heard your feedback and we delivered! Super reinforced bars, semi-artistic tile pattern, this model is definitely for you if you want to make sure your prisoner stays put for life!

String.Source: THIS is the product to have for solving our your lockup needs. Installs anywhere in mere seconds. That pesky nuisance will NEVER get out of here. Guaranteed!
String.Dest: THIS is the product to have for solving our your lockup needs. Installs anywhere in mere seconds. That pesky nuisance will NEVER get out of here. Guaranteed!

String.Source: Made from Jade? Of course not! That would be incredibly expensive! No, this is a beautiful cell wall to bring enjoyment to even the most jaded Sims!
String.Dest: Made from Jade? Of course not! That would be incredibly expensive! No, this is a beautiful cell wall to bring enjoyment to even the most jaded Sims!

String.Source: It's brilliant! A see-through wall! Not glass or anything like that, but an open air space intersected by bar-like metal columns. Have you ever seen anything like it?
String.Dest: It's brilliant! A see-through wall! Not glass or anything like that, but an open air space intersected by bar-like metal columns. Have you ever seen anything like it?

String.Source: This chemical analyzer combines the most up-to-date software and state of the art technology. Allow your Sims to get the most accurate readings on all of their experiments and be the envy of all scientists in town, plus it also has LASERS! Who doesn't like lasers?!
