String.Source: Crandestine is an otherworldly red gemstone like nothing ever seen on Earth.
String.Dest: Crandestine is an otherworldly red gemstone like nothing ever seen on Earth.

String.Source: Nitelite is a fluorescent green crystal that is so bright it burns to look directly at it.
String.Dest: Nitelite is a fluorescent green crystal that is so bright it burns to look directly at it.

String.Source: Xenopetrium is a highly volatile element. It was discovered when a child tripped over a deposit of the rare substance while trying to catch his runaway Xenoflox. The poor child was propelled clear to a nearby moon. The discovery led to a period of rapid innovation, including space flight. The boy was retrieved only a few orbits later and reunited with his beloved pet.
String.Dest: Xenopetrium is a highly volatile element. It was discovered when a child tripped over a deposit of the rare substance while trying to catch his runaway Xenoflox. The poor child was propelled clear to a nearby moon. The discovery led to a period of rapid innovation, including space flight. The boy was retrieved only a few orbits later and reunited with his beloved pet.

String.Source: Looks like something messed with the wrong gosh darn rec room.
String.Dest: Looks like something messed with the wrong gosh darn rec room.

String.Source: "True Blue" Xur Corbut managed to unite the ancient clans. He ushered in the modern era of tranquility where the search for the ultimate party is prized above all else. Legend has it that Corbut was able to champion the most legendary party ever held on Sixam. Everyone on the planet took part... except for one holdout. "Glumbut the Wet Blanket."
String.Dest: "True Blue" Xur Corbut managed to unite the ancient clans. He ushered in the modern era of tranquility where the search for the ultimate party is prized above all else. Legend has it that Corbut was able to champion the most legendary party ever held on Sixam. Everyone on the planet took part... except for one holdout. "Glumbut the Wet Blanket."

String.Source: Glumbut believed that partying was a waste of time. He thought it was a waste to spend immense amounts of resources trying to make Fizzy Juice 2% more fizzy. Nobody liked Glumbut very much. But hey, they named this rock after him. That's something.
String.Dest: Glumbut believed that partying was a waste of time. He thought it was a waste to spend immense amounts of resources trying to make Fizzy Juice 2% more fizzy. Nobody liked Glumbut very much. But hey, they named this rock after him. That's something.

String.Source: Zarinne was a legendary dancer that climbed the dance battle ranks on the colony of Funkistan. She became well known for wearing a bright orange jumpsuit which complimented her fair blue skin tone.
String.Dest: Zarinne was a legendary dancer that climbed the dance battle ranks on the colony of Funkistan. She became well known for wearing a bright orange jumpsuit which complimented her fair blue skin tone.

String.Source: Burble's Brew was an immensely popular drink a few centuries ago. Anyone who was anyone was drinking it. But, before you knew it, everyone's hair was falling out. Almost the entire population became bald. Folks scrambled to cover up the shame of their chrome domes. But, Mylom was brave enough to proudly display her bald head. And, soon others joined her until it became fashionable to do so. To this day her name is synonymous with inner beauty and strength. This stone was named in her honor.
String.Dest: Burble's Brew was an immensely popular drink a few centuries ago. Anyone who was anyone was drinking it. But, before you knew it, everyone's hair was falling out. Almost the entire population became bald. Folks scrambled to cover up the shame of their chrome domes. But, Mylom was brave enough to proudly display her bald head. And, soon others joined her until it became fashionable to do so. To this day her name is synonymous with inner beauty and strength. This stone was named in her honor.

String.Source: Eye of the Stormbore looks like the terrifying red eye of an ancient creature that used to terrorize unexpecting folks slumbering away in dream land. It would sneak up, wait hours, and then look straight into your soul as you woke up. The Stormbore would then run off delighted to have surprised another poor sap. Is it any wonder they went extinct long, long ago?
String.Dest: Eye of the Stormbore looks like the terrifying red eye of an ancient creature that used to terrorize unexpecting folks slumbering away in dream land. It would sneak up, wait hours, and then look straight into your soul as you woke up. The Stormbore would then run off delighted to have surprised another poor sap. Is it any wonder they went extinct long, long ago?

String.Source: If you squint your eyes and turn your head, this geode looks a little bit like a snack food that became an intergalactic sensation when the Duchess of Hiattoid tripped on one at her coronation.
String.Dest: If you squint your eyes and turn your head, this geode looks a little bit like a snack food that became an intergalactic sensation when the Duchess of Hiattoid tripped on one at her coronation.

String.Source: What lies beneath the surface of this alien space rock? There is only one way to find out.
String.Dest: What lies beneath the surface of this alien space rock? There is only one way to find out.

String.Source: Blutonium is an element found on Sixam. Like a deep ocean abyss, it is hauntingly beautiful.
String.Dest: Blutonium is an element found on Sixam. Like a deep ocean abyss, it is hauntingly beautiful.

String.Source: Solarium is a beautiful orange element created by the gravitational collapse of a star.
String.Dest: Solarium is a beautiful orange element created by the gravitational collapse of a star.

String.Source: Smoking craters are known to be home to small alien animal life.
String.Dest: Smoking craters are known to be home to small alien animal life.

String.Dest: Crandestine crystals can be found periodically emitted from Crandestine deposits.

String.Source: Geodes can be found forming on these pedestals.
String.Dest: Geodes can be found forming on these pedestals.

String.Source: “Upstanding,” cried the floor to the column. “Be you upright and sturdy?” Upstanding looked down upon the lowly floor tiles with footprints aplenty, as all columns do. “ Nay!” it said. But, was its josh in jest? Or truth?
String.Dest: “Upstanding,” cried the floor to the column. “Be you upright and sturdy?” Upstanding looked down upon the lowly floor tiles with footprints aplenty, as all columns do. “ Nay!” it said. But, was its josh in jest? Or truth?

String.Source: Sturdy, upright, 100% column. Nobody is going to tell this column it’s not a column. No, this is a Column’s Column!
String.Dest: Sturdy, upright, 100% column. Nobody is going to tell this column it’s not a column. No, this is a Column’s Column!

String.Source: Generations of mad scientists have trusted the stability of their underground lairs to this steadfast column.

String.Dest: Be careful what you do on this computer. You never know who is watching you!

String.Source: Big Boss Person needs a slender, dainty, glistening PC for bringing in the dirtiest, grimiest wrongdoers.

String.Source: It's not just a POS, it's an all-in-one owner solution! Open and close your store, hire (and FIRE) employees, set your prices, and view your daily finances. You're a management maven with the Bizoleons Cash Register in your POSsession!
String.Dest: It's not just a POS, it's an all-in-one owner solution! Open and close your store, hire (and FIRE) employees, set your prices, and view your daily finances. You're a management maven with the Bizoleons Cash Register in your POSsession!

String.Source: Suros engineers designed the Pecuniary Cash Register using recovered Golden Age schematics. Forced out of production by a crippling shortage of Simoleons, the few remaining models are cherished by those shopkeepers fortunate enough to trade perk points on the black market to procure one.

String.Source: What You See is What You Buy! After initial attempts to sell customers perishable food products sight unseen, the innovators and Smith and Hootson replaced their hallmark, lifeless steel doors with transparent glass. Now, customers can SEE their food before paying, a novel concept that led to a 4% increase in sales. At Smith and Hootson, we’re transparent when it greases our pockets.

String.Source: Two dashes of paint and a sorcery of color immulsifies your intentions. “Wait,” you ask. “Immulsify” isn’t a word. “Shhhh” the work of art says, extending a solitary metaphorical finger to your lips. “Enjoy me,” it beckons. So you do. Utter Confusion – art that “speaks” to you.
String.Dest: Two dashes of paint and a sorcery of color immulsifies your intentions. “Wait,” you ask. “Immulsify” isn’t a word. “Shhhh” the work of art says, extending a solitary metaphorical finger to your lips. “Enjoy me,” it beckons. So you do. Utter Confusion – art that “speaks” to you.

String.Source: A shining example of early onset late-century modernismo, this triptych depicts a glorious field of sunflowers seen from the perspective of a newborn llama. String.Dest: Backlit Screen Print Sign, From Andre’s Big Banners

String.Source: The Heart That Beats is the heart that keeps you alive. This is not that heart. This is the heart that will tell all in your community where to find help when they are in need.
String.Dest: The Heart That Beats is the heart that keeps you alive. This is not that heart. This is the heart that will tell all in your community where to find help when they are in need.

String.Source:
A classic elegant sign for any discerning store front. It hangs at any height on the walls to make a true statement of exquisiteness.
Placing this sign will help bring more customers to your store.
String.Dest:
A classic elegant sign for any discerning store front. It hangs at any height on the walls to make a true statement of exquisiteness.
Placing this sign will help bring more customers to your store.

String.Source:
Looking for a bright way to draw attention to your store? This store sign will attract more eager patrons that you could ever imagine or want. Actual results may vary.
Placing this sign will help bring more customers to your store.
String.Dest:
Looking for a bright way to draw attention to your store? This store sign will attract more eager patrons that you could ever imagine or want. Actual results may vary.
Placing this sign will help bring more customers to your store.

String.Source:
Never before has the sign of a bookstore been more clean, clear, and precise. Anyone who walks by will know exactly where to go for all their literature needs.
Placing this sign will help bring more customers to your store.
String.Dest:
Never before has the sign of a bookstore been more clean, clear, and precise. Anyone who walks by will know exactly where to go for all their literature needs.

String.Source: The SimRay is the future in handheld devices. Because it is extremely experimental, 60% of the time it works all the time.
String.Dest: The SimRay is the future in handheld devices. Because it is extremely experimental, 60% of the time it works all the time.

String.Source: Dispense water. Dispense soap. Dispense water. Drain soap and water. The End.
String.Dest: Dispense water. Dispense soap. Dispense water. Drain soap and water. The End.

String.Source: Gets the Job Done Commercial Metal Sink
String.Dest: Gets the Job Done Commercial Metal Sink

String.Source: Day in and day out this loyal stool scoots doctor's behinds around so that they can better treat their patients. Does anyone ever say thank you? No they do not, no one does…
String.Dest: Day in and day out this loyal stool scoots doctor's behinds around so that they can better treat their patients. Does anyone ever say thank you? No they do not, no one does…

String.Source: Whenever there is a tough nut to crack, the station brings in The Attainder. With a higher arrest rate than even the most distinguished detective on the force, this is one chair you don't want to mess with.
String.Dest: Whenever there is a tough nut to crack, the station brings in The Attainder. With a higher arrest rate than even the most distinguished detective on the force, this is one chair you don't want to mess with.

String.Source: The hard lines and soft cushion say, "I'm a stern knight of the law, but I also require back support."
String.Dest: The hard lines and soft cushion say, "I'm a stern knight of the law, but I also require back support."

String.Source: The contoured back and wheels say "I'm an intelligent shepherd of welfare, but I also require the ability to zip around while staying seated."
String.Dest: The contoured back and wheels say "I'm an intelligent shepherd of welfare, but I also require the ability to zip around while staying seated."

String.Source: Only the finest crystal is used to cradle any true Chief’s fanny. Our luxurious Crystalline Bottom Holster is no exception.
String.Dest: Only the finest crystal is used to cradle any true Chief’s fanny. Our luxurious Crystalline Bottom Holster is no exception.

String.Source: Unlock by reaching level 10 of the Detective career.
String.Dest: Unlock by reaching level 10 of the Detective career.

String.Source: This chair looks great and also feels fun to sit on. Not only is it a chair, but you could probably put something underneath it to make sure it doesn't get away from you. Like, a ball or something.
String.Dest: This chair looks great and also feels fun to sit on. Not only is it a chair, but you could probably put something underneath it to make sure it doesn't get away from you. Like, a ball or something.

String.Source: Whether it be a waiting room or a living room, this chair has been elegantly manufactured to function perfectly wherever you choose to place it. We believe that it's your chair, so it's your choice where to place it.
String.Dest: Whether it be a waiting room or a living room, this chair has been elegantly manufactured to function perfectly wherever you choose to place it. We believe that it's your chair, so it's your choice where to place it.

String.Source: This chair is named in honor of the late Sgt. James Thompson of the Sunset Valley Police Department - the only Sgt. to ever have met his end due to the poor construction of a chair. We promise to have made this chair extra sturdy.
String.Dest: This chair is named in honor of the late Sgt. James Thompson of the Sunset Valley Police Department - the only Sgt. to ever have met his end due to the poor construction of a chair. We promise to have made this chair extra sturdy.

String.Source: The exquisitely sloped arms of this chair connote the graceful and meandering hill sides of the Llamahorn - the most majestic mountain ever seen through a set of a Sim's eyes.
String.Dest: The exquisitely sloped arms of this chair connote the graceful and meandering hill sides of the Llamahorn - the most majestic mountain ever seen through a set of a Sim's eyes.

String.Source: Cuddle up with your loved ones as you wait for news (good or bad) in this traditional canvas couch.
String.Dest: Cuddle up with your loved ones as you wait for news (good or bad) in this traditional canvas couch.

String.Source: If you need a rigid sturdy surface to sit on, this bench is for you! Note the sleek lines and smooth waterproof surface, perfect for sitting to catch your breath or if you just need a nap. It will resist the drool and give you just the support you need.
String.Dest: If you need a rigid sturdy surface to sit on, this bench is for you! Note the sleek lines and smooth waterproof surface, perfect for sitting to catch your breath or if you just need a nap. It will resist the drool and give you just the support you need.

String.Source: A tough, uncompromising couch perfect for public use in an office, waiting room or well trafficked area. Allow Sims to sit comfortably, but not too comfortably while waiting for information or to be helped.
String.Dest: A tough, uncompromising couch perfect for public use in an office, waiting room or well trafficked area. Allow Sims to sit comfortably, but not too comfortably while waiting for information or to be helped.

String.Source: Industrial grade bench. Feel free to take a seat but it won't be comfortable.
String.Dest: Industrial grade bench. Feel free to take a seat but it won't be comfortable.

String.Source: Turn up the style in your living room with this fashionable piece of furniture. Whether you're resting comfortably in repose, or trying to maximize how much room your arms have while leaving your companion to sit with cringe-worthy back support, you'll always look great doing it.
String.Dest: Turn up the style in your living room with this fashionable piece of furniture. Whether you're resting comfortably in repose, or trying to maximize how much room your arms have while leaving your companion to sit with cringe-worthy back support, you'll always look great doing it.

String.Source: This wall-mounted stereo is intended for use at community venues. The inoffensive music it blares is commonly encountered when one enters an elevator, but swiftly becomes an unending descent into madness that can't be shut off.
String.Dest: This wall-mounted stereo is intended for use at community venues. The inoffensive music it blares is commonly encountered when one enters an elevator, but swiftly becomes an unending descent into madness that can't be shut off.

String.Source: This state of the art surgery table restrains while it performs the surgery for you! Robot arms become your arms and help take all the headache out of a typical surgery. Think of all the lives you can save with this technological wonder and all the babies that it will bring into this world. So many babies!
String.Dest: This state of the art surgery table restrains while it performs the surgery for you! Robot arms become your arms and help take all the headache out of a typical surgery. Think of all the lives you can save with this technological wonder and all the babies that it will bring into this world. So many babies!

String.Source: This state of the art surgery table restrains while it performs the surgery for you! Think of all the lives you can save with this technological wonder and all the babies that it will bring into this world!
String.Dest: This state of the art surgery table restrains while it performs the surgery for you! Think of all the lives you can save with this technological wonder and all the babies that it will bring into this world!

String.Source: Sleek, smooth, and shiny. These are the words that describe this coffee table best. It can be used to place magazines, beverages, lamps, and décor.
String.Dest: Sleek, smooth, and shiny. These are the words that describe this coffee table best. It can be used to place magazines, beverages, lamps, and décor.

String.Source: Nothing screams modern like some cubes. We included two in this pedestal, which features a two-tone surface because we hear that's modern too.
String.Dest: Nothing screams modern like some cubes. We included two in this pedestal, which features a two-tone surface because we hear that's modern too.

String.Source: Want to impress someone? All you need to do is have a really classy surface for your heated beverages. Trust us, glass and wood are the ultimate combination for this.
String.Dest: Want to impress someone? All you need to do is have a really classy surface for your heated beverages. Trust us, glass and wood are the ultimate combination for this.

String.Source: A clean and polished wooden table that can be used to store personal items or documents and can also be used to display framed certificates, awards, or pictures.
String.Dest: A clean and polished wooden table that can be used to store personal items or documents and can also be used to display framed certificates, awards, or pictures.

String.Source: To call this just another end table doesn’t do this little puppy justice. Designed with the mindset to gather and collect data. This table can act as an organizer for all your active lab notes and journals; possibly leading you to discover and unravel another fascinating find in the world of Science.
String.Dest: To call this just another end table doesn’t do this little puppy justice. Designed with the mindset to gather and collect data. This table can act as an organizer for all your active lab notes and journals; possibly leading you to discover and unravel another fascinating find in the world of Science.

String.Source: To ensure the ultimate care for all your precious lab materials, look no further than the Chill Box 9200. Enclosed with reinforced titanium cooling panels to maintain the coolest environment for any type of lab specimen needing to maintain a balanced sub-zero temperature. With attached rollers for easy transportation for any circumstance you might find yourself in.
String.Dest: To ensure the ultimate care for all your precious lab materials, look no further than the Chill Box 9200. Enclosed with reinforced titanium cooling panels to maintain the coolest environment for any type of lab specimen needing to maintain a balanced sub-zero temperature. With attached rollers for easy transportation for any circumstance you might find yourself in.

String.Source: The elegance of this table is unrivaled, and its glass top screams that you've got class. Or maybe it's glass? I can't tell with all the screaming.
String.Dest: The elegance of this table is unrivaled, and its glass top screams that you've got class. Or maybe it's glass? I can't tell with all the screaming.

String.Source: A harmonious blending of cheap sheet metal and laminated press-board, a good hallway table is a must-have for any proper office. Plus it makes a lovely “BWONG!” noise every time someone bumps into it.
String.Dest: A harmonious blending of cheap sheet metal and laminated press-board, a good hallway table is a must-have for any proper office. Plus it makes a lovely “BWONG!” noise every time someone bumps into it.

String.Source: This table allows a Sim to get to the Truth. By ANY means necessary. This Interrogation Table is not to be confused with the Table of Interrogation; an official document outlining the Approved Information Extraction Techniques.
String.Dest: This table allows a Sim to get to the Truth. By ANY means necessary. This Interrogation Table is not to be confused with the Table of Interrogation; an official document outlining the Approved Information Extraction Techniques.

String.Source: Forged in the eternal fires of the Llamahorn, the steel used in this toilet is of unrivaled purity. So much so that it retains absolutely no heat. With this toilet, you'll never experience the joy (or terror) of knowing it was recently used by someone else.
String.Dest: Forged in the eternal fires of the Llamahorn, the steel used in this toilet is of unrivaled purity. So much so that it retains absolutely no heat. With this toilet, you'll never experience the joy (or terror) of knowing it was recently used by someone else.

String.Source: Saying goodbye to someone is difficult. Have a monument worthy of your loved ones in display to remember them with grandeur.
String.Dest: Saying goodbye to someone is difficult. Have a monument worthy of your loved ones in display to remember them with grandeur.

String.Source: A simple and effective handheld device.
String.Dest: A simple and effective handheld device.

String.Source: A sample taking from a Sim, for use with the Chemical Analyzer.
String.Dest: A sample taking from a Sim, for use with the Chemical Analyzer.

String.Source: The latest and greatest from SIM Sciences’ research and development team. This model brings the future into your home, and helps you throw away the past. SIM Sciences, building a better future, one square foot at a time.
String.Dest: The latest and greatest from SIM Sciences’ research and development team. This model brings the future into your home, and helps you throw away the past. SIM Sciences, building a better future, one square foot at a time.

String.Source: A plastic container that will gracefully dispose of just about any trash you deposit into it. The best part is that once it is emptied out, it can do it all over again.
String.Dest: A plastic container that will gracefully dispose of just about any trash you deposit into it. The best part is that once it is emptied out, it can do it all over again.

String.Source: An advanced piece of performance testing equipment
String.Dest: An advanced piece of performance testing equipment

String.Source: This large variety of the Dancing Red Maple Tree specimen will definitely win you over! Its whimsical trunk design makes it seem as if it is twirling, very cute! If you pay attention you can actually see it dance ever so slightly. It will give your Lot an accent out of this world.
String.Dest: This large variety of the Dancing Red Maple Tree specimen will definitely win you over! Its whimsical trunk design makes it seem as if it is twirling, very cute! If you pay attention you can actually see it dance ever so slightly. It will give your Lot an accent out of this world.

String.Source: Add grace and beauty to your Lot with this lovely variety of Red Maple. Its deep red leaves and whimsical trunk design will bring life to any Lot. If you pay attention you can actually see it dance ever so slightly.
String.Dest: Add grace and beauty to your Lot with this lovely variety of Red Maple. Its deep red leaves and whimsical trunk design will bring life to any Lot. If you pay attention you can actually see it dance ever so slightly.

String.Source: For times in which space is an issue or you just want to decorate the walls with televisions. The SpaceKeeper fits your needs with a sleek design and easy to mount frame.
String.Dest: For times in which space is an issue or you just want to decorate the walls with televisions. The SpaceKeeper fits your needs with a sleek design and easy to mount frame.

String.Source: This might look like a work of art to most, but what is inside is your most prized possession. The beauty of the urn is secondary; what's important is that whatever it is, it is resting in peace inside.
String.Dest: This might look like a work of art to most, but what is inside is your most prized possession. The beauty of the urn is secondary; what's important is that whatever it is, it is resting in peace inside.

String.Source: From unrivaled woodworking craftsman, set your eyes on an elegant two paned window framed in the world's finest wood.
String.Dest: From unrivaled woodworking craftsman, set your eyes on an elegant two paned window framed in the world's finest wood.

String.Source: Seeing the sun come through those metal bars for the rest of your time in the Big House is a very depressing thing. If you really want that vibe in your home, then, here you go.
String.Dest: Seeing the sun come through those metal bars for the rest of your time in the Big House is a very depressing thing. If you really want that vibe in your home, then, here you go.

String.Source: Nothing says "Good morning!" like an arched window that lets in the maximum amount of sunlight. Simple, elegant, and wonderfully inviting, this window will change how you see the outside world.
String.Dest: Nothing says "Good morning!" like an arched window that lets in the maximum amount of sunlight. Simple, elegant, and wonderfully inviting, this window will change how you see the outside world.

String.Source: Window you see me, window you don’t! This dual tinted panel is ideal for any establishment needing privacy along with strong design appeal.
String.Dest: Window you see me, window you don’t! This dual tinted panel is ideal for any establishment needing privacy along with strong design appeal.

String.Source: Some Sims just can’t contain themselves. Privacy Glass helps protect us from them, as much as them from us.
String.Dest: Some Sims just can’t contain themselves. Privacy Glass helps protect us from them, as much as them from us.

String.Source: If you want a window that doesn’t hold, and has no bars, this is the one for you! If you want something to keep the bad guys in, best look elsewhere.
String.Dest: If you want a window that doesn’t hold, and has no bars, this is the one for you! If you want something to keep the bad guys in, best look elsewhere.

String.Source: The artistry of Champs Les Sims comes to life in this one of a kind wrought iron window. Available for bulk purchase.
String.Dest: The artistry of Champs Les Sims comes to life in this one of a kind wrought iron window. Available for bulk purchase.

String.Source: It’s big, it’s clear, it gets the point across. Get in here and buy something already, won’t you?
String.Dest: It’s big, it’s clear, it gets the point across. Get in here and buy something already, won’t you?

String.Source: Look at all This Stuff! Window
String.Dest: Look at all This Stuff! Window

String.Source: The X-180 is almost indestructible. Made from transparent aluminum, the window feels like it came from the future.
String.Dest: The X-180 is almost indestructible. Made from transparent aluminum, the window feels like it came from the future.

String.Source: A large one-way mirror excellent for police interrogation rooms and video game research groups,
String.Dest: A large one-way mirror excellent for police interrogation rooms and video game research groups,

String.Source: Now with more viewing area. View Sims from either side of this window, watching everything they do... everything.
String.Dest: Now with more viewing area. View Sims from either side of this window, watching everything they do... everything.

String.Source: A hi-tech medical device that scans Sims for maladies with the power of radiation
String.Dest: A hi-tech medical device that scans Sims for maladies with the power of radiation

String.Source: The writing appears to have faded away.
String.Dest: The writing appears to have faded away.

String.Source: It is certified that {0.SimFirstName} is a healthy baby {M0.boy}{F0.girl}!
String.Dest: It is certified that {0.SimFirstName} is a healthy baby {M0.boy}{F0.girl}!

String.Source: Are you sure you want to send {1.SimFirstName} back to {M1.his}{F1.her} home planet? Communications between Earth and Sixam are impossible; all relations with this baby will be severed and {M1.he}{F1.she} will be permanently removed from the household.
String.Dest: Are you sure you want to send {1.SimFirstName} back to {M1.his}{F1.her} home planet? Communications between Earth and Sixam are impossible; all relations with this baby will be severed and {M1.he}{F1.she} will be permanently removed from the household.

String.Source: There is no one who needs to be fingerprinted right now.
String.Dest: There is no one who needs to be fingerprinted right now.

String.Source: There is no one who needs to be searched right now.
String.Dest: There is no one who needs to be searched right now.

String.Source: There is no one who needs a mugshot right now.
String.Dest: There is no one who needs a mugshot right now.

String.Source: {1.SimFirstName} has already had a Mugshot taken recently.
String.Dest: {1.SimFirstName} has already had a Mugshot taken recently.

String.Source: Click on a Cell Door to choose a Sim to Lock in the Cell.
String.Dest: Click on a Cell Door to choose a Sim to Lock in the Cell.

String.Source: No Evidence to analyze. Evidence can be found at Crime Scenes.
String.Dest: No Evidence to analyze. Evidence can be found at Crime Scenes.

String.Source: Find Crystals, Metals, Elements, or Space Rocks to analyze. Crystals and Metals can be found in rocks throughout the world.
String.Dest: Find Crystals, Metals, Elements, or Space Rocks to analyze. Crystals and Metals can be found in rocks throughout the world.

String.Source: Testing the analyzer can help you get familiar with its operation.
String.Dest: Testing the analyzer can help you get familiar with its operation.

String.Source: Harvest Fruits or Flowers to analyze. Analyzing Flora can improve its quality.
String.Dest: Harvest Fruits or Flowers to analyze. Analyzing Flora can improve its quality.

String.Source: Testing of the patient tissue sample in the Chemical Analyzer was inconclusive. {0.SimFirstName} was confused by the questionable data results and will need to run further examinations on {1.SimName} for a clear diagnosis.
String.Dest: Testing of the patient tissue sample in the Chemical Analyzer was inconclusive. {0.SimFirstName} was confused by the questionable data results and will need to run further examinations on {1.SimName} for a clear diagnosis.

String.Source: Testing of {1.SimName}’s tissue sample in the Chemical Analyzer was successful. The results were normal, showing no presence of any contagions. {0.SimFirstName} can give {1.SimName} a clean bill of health diagnosis!
String.Dest: Testing of {1.SimName}’s tissue sample in the Chemical Analyzer was successful. The results were normal, showing no presence of any contagions. {0.SimFirstName} can give {1.SimName} a clean bill of health diagnosis!

String.Source:
The testing of {1.SimName}’s tissue sample in the Chemical Analyzer was successful.
The results strongly indicate the presence of an infectious illness, which {0.SimFirstName} needs to diagnose and treat…
String.Dest:
The testing of {1.SimName}’s tissue sample in the Chemical Analyzer was successful.
The results strongly indicate the presence of an infectious illness, which {0.SimFirstName} needs to diagnose and treat…

String.Dest: No valid sample items to analyze

String.Source: Use a Chemical Analyzer to select this item for analysis
String.Dest: Use a Chemical Analyzer to select this item for analysis

String.Source: No DNA Samples to analyze. Ask other for a Sample. Friends are more likely to help.
String.Dest: No DNA Samples to analyze. Ask other for a Sample. Friends are more likely to help.

Upgrade complete!
{0.SimFirstName} has finished installing the Chemical Analyzer upgrade.
String.Dest:
Upgrade complete!
{0.SimFirstName} has finished installing the Chemical Analyzer upgrade.

String.Source: Hello, {1.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} reporting that my attempts to analyze crystals has resulted in some {2.ObjectName}.
String.Dest: Hello, {1.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} reporting that my attempts to analyze crystals has resulted in some {2.ObjectName}.

String.Source: Hello, {1.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} reporting that my attempts at analyzing crystals resulted in nothing of interest.
String.Dest: Hello, {1.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} reporting that my attempts at analyzing crystals resulted in nothing of interest.

String.Source: Hello, {1.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} reporting that my attempts to analyze flora have yielded {2.ObjectName}.
String.Dest: Hello, {1.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} reporting that my attempts to analyze flora have yielded {2.ObjectName}.

String.Source: Hello, {1.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} reporting that my attempts at analyzing flora have yielded nothing of interest.
String.Dest: Hello, {1.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} reporting that my attempts at analyzing flora have yielded nothing of interest.

String.Source: Hello, {1.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} reporting that my attempts at metal analysis resulted in nothing meaningful. My apologies.
String.Dest: Hello, {1.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} reporting that my attempts at metal analysis resulted in nothing meaningful. My apologies.

String.Source: Hello, {1.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} reporting that my attempts to analyze metals resulted in some {2.ObjectName}.
String.Dest: Hello, {1.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} reporting that my attempts to analyze metals resulted in some {2.ObjectName}.

String.Source: Eww. The Chemical Analyzer is too dirty to practice on. "Clean" it first.
String.Dest: Eww. The Chemical Analyzer is too dirty to practice on. "Clean" it first.

String.Source: Upgrade the centrifuge with a solid steel replacement that will never break.
String.Dest: Upgrade the centrifuge with a solid steel replacement that will never break.

String.Source: Are you juking the stats? You can tell me, {0.SimLastName}. Crime is the lowest it’s ever been. Tell me how you did it!
String.Dest: Are you juking the stats? You can tell me, {0.SimLastName}. Crime is the lowest it’s ever been. Tell me how you did it!

String.Source: Impressive work on your recent case. What, would you say if I told you crime was down 12% since you joined the force? What!? You already knew that? Like I said, {0.SimLastName}, you’re very fast.
String.Dest: Impressive work on your recent case. What, would you say if I told you crime was down 12% since you joined the force? What!? You already knew that? Like I said, {0.SimLastName}, you’re very fast.

String.Source: Remember who you are talking to Lieutenant. You might be rising through the ranks fast. But, remember I can bust you down to Cadet so fast it’ll make your head spin.
String.Dest: Remember who you are talking to Lieutenant. You might be rising through the ranks fast. But, remember I can bust you down to Cadet so fast it’ll make your head spin.

String.Source: {0.SimLastName} it’s officers like you that allow us to get hit with 3 burglaries, 5 arsons, and 2 vandalisms in the last 24 hours. Get back to work!
String.Dest: {0.SimLastName} it’s officers like you that allow us to get hit with 3 burglaries, 5 arsons, and 2 vandalisms in the last 24 hours. Get back to work!

String.Source: {0.SimLastName} if you so much as play one game of Blic Block, I’ll throw you in one of those cells and take bets on how long you’ll last.
String.Dest: {0.SimLastName} if you so much as play one game of Blic Block, I’ll throw you in one of those cells and take bets on how long you’ll last.

String.Source: You know {0.SimLastName}. I was reviewing the numbers and I can count the number of cases you’ve cleared on one hand. Get out there and solve some cases.
String.Dest: You know {0.SimLastName}. I was reviewing the numbers and I can count the number of cases you’ve cleared on one hand. Get out there and solve some cases.

String.Source: {0.SimLastName}, you think you’re pretty smart, don’t you? I bet you think you’re the smartest {F0.gal}{M0.guy} in the room. Well, I am here to tell you I’ve had bladder failures with twice the brains you’ve got {F0.lady}{M0.pal}.
String.Dest: {0.SimLastName}, you think you’re pretty smart, don’t you? I bet you think you’re the smartest {F0.gal}{M0.guy} in the room. Well, I am here to tell you I’ve had bladder failures with twice the brains you’ve got {F0.lady}{M0.pal}.

String.Source: How long does it take to solve a case? Are you dragging your heels? I want results {0.SimLastName}. And, I want them yesterday!
String.Dest: How long does it take to solve a case? Are you dragging your heels? I want results {0.SimLastName}. And, I want them yesterday!

String.Source: {0.SimLastName}, are you originally from Sunset Valley? Well, I don’t know how things work over there in the Valley. But, over here, we follow a little thing called the chain of command.
String.Dest: {0.SimLastName}, are you originally from Sunset Valley? Well, I don’t know how things work over there in the Valley. But, over here, we follow a little thing called the chain of command.

String.Source: Not my tempo {0.SimLastName}. Faster. Faster. Solve cases faster!
String.Dest: Not my tempo {0.SimLastName}. Faster. Faster. Solve cases faster!

String.Source: You got a problem with authority, {0.SimLastName}? Well I’ve got a problem with know-it-all punks like you. Back to work.
String.Dest: You got a problem with authority, {0.SimLastName}? Well I’ve got a problem with know-it-all punks like you. Back to work.

String.Source: You’re a real blue flame special, aren’t you {0.SimLastName}?
String.Dest: You’re a real blue flame special, aren’t you {0.SimLastName}?

String.Source: How many clearances have you given me, {0.SimLastName}? I’ll tell you EXACTLY how many… NOT NEARLY ENOUGH!”
String.Dest: How many clearances have you given me, {0.SimLastName}? I’ll tell you EXACTLY how many… NOT NEARLY ENOUGH!”

String.Source: Are you having trouble with the writing on the wall, {0.SimLastName}? Either get me some clearances, or start looking for a new line of work!
String.Dest: Are you having trouble with the writing on the wall, {0.SimLastName}? Either get me some clearances, or start looking for a new line of work!

String.Source: I’m one excessive force complaint away from asking for your badge. Watch yourself {0.SimLastName}.
String.Dest: I’m one excessive force complaint away from asking for your badge. Watch yourself {0.SimLastName}.

String.Source: I was having lunch with the mayor. And, she was furious. So, you know what that means? I AM FURIOUS! Bring the crime numbers down, {0.SimLastName}. Or else.
String.Dest: I was having lunch with the mayor. And, she was furious. So, you know what that means? I AM FURIOUS! Bring the crime numbers down, {0.SimLastName}. Or else.

String.Source: I’ve carried you for too long {0.SimLastName}. I’m not going to watch these streets devolve into chaos because of your ego.
String.Dest: I’ve carried you for too long {0.SimLastName}. I’m not going to watch these streets devolve into chaos because of your ego.

String.Source: I’ve got the commissioner breathing down my neck. So, guess what hot shot. That means I’m going to be breathing down yours. I want results!
String.Dest: I’ve got the commissioner breathing down my neck. So, guess what hot shot. That means I’m going to be breathing down yours. I want results!

String.Source: You’d be wise to watch your back {0.SimLastName}. Rise through the ranks this fast and you are bound to make enemies.
String.Dest: You’d be wise to watch your back {0.SimLastName}. Rise through the ranks this fast and you are bound to make enemies.

String.Source: You’re a real loose cannon, you know that {0.SimLastName}?
String.Dest: You’re a real loose cannon, you know that {0.SimLastName}?

String.Source: I’m tired of looking at so much red ink. Get some more cases in the black!
String.Dest: I’m tired of looking at so much red ink. Get some more cases in the black!

String.Source: The reports say crime is down in the western district this month. Must be a coincidence.
String.Dest: The reports say crime is down in the western district this month. Must be a coincidence.

String.Source: The clone slot is currently occupied by another object.
String.Dest: The clone slot is currently occupied by another object.

String.Source: A valid item to copy must be placed onto cloning machine
String.Dest: A valid item to copy must be placed onto cloning machine

String.Source: Oops...Looks like something did not go quite right with the cloning process.
String.Dest: Oops...Looks like something did not go quite right with the cloning process.

String.Source: Cannot Exceed 8 Sims in a household
String.Dest: Cannot Exceed 8 Sims in a household

String.Source: Cannot Clone a Sim while an object is on the machine
String.Dest: Cannot Clone a Sim while an object is on the machine

String.Source: This object requires an upgrade by the Invention Constructor to perform this action.
String.Dest: This object requires an upgrade by the Invention Constructor to perform this action.

String.Source: Two of you is always better. Install the Sim Cloning module to clone Sims.
String.Dest: Two of you is always better. Install the Sim Cloning module to clone Sims.

String.Source: To Upgrade, drag the Cloning Machine into the Invention Constructor, then click on the Invention Constructor and select Upgrade.
String.Dest: To Upgrade, drag the Cloning Machine into the Invention Constructor, then click on the Invention Constructor and select Upgrade.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has upgraded the Cloning Machine. Now it can "Clone Sim" as well as cloning objects! Time for a new sibling?
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has upgraded the Cloning Machine. Now it can "Clone Sim" as well as cloning objects! Time for a new sibling?

String.Source: Alerting Doctor {0.SimLastName}: "An extremely sick sim just stumbled into the waiting room, barely conscious and able to stand. Quickly come to the Front Reception Desk. They need urgent medical attention... STAT!"
String.Dest: Alerting Doctor {0.SimLastName}: "An extremely sick sim just stumbled into the waiting room, barely conscious and able to stand. Quickly come to the Front Reception Desk. They need urgent medical attention... STAT!"

String.Source: This resource has already been collected
String.Dest: This resource has already been collected

String.Source: Getting your case assignment is the first step in fighting crime!
String.Dest: Getting your case assignment is the first step in fighting crime!

String.Source: Add New Studies Info to Medical Journal
String.Dest: Add New Studies Info to Medical Journal

String.Source: Research Health Reports on Medical Journal
String.Dest: Research Health Reports on Medical Journal

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} is still mentally drained from the last time {M0.he}{F0.she} tried this.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} is still mentally drained from the last time {M0.he}{F0.she} tried this.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} was unable to deduce any new clues.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} was unable to deduce any new clues.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} was unable to determine the location of the next Crime Scene.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} was unable to determine the location of the next Crime Scene.

String.Source: An APB will take you to the location of a sighting of someone matching your suspect description.
String.Dest: An APB will take you to the location of a sighting of someone matching your suspect description.

String.Source: Add more clues to the Crime Map to find a suspect!
String.Dest: Add more clues to the Crime Map to find a suspect!

String.Source: This action has already been performed.
String.Dest: This action has already been performed.

String.Source: This Crime Scene will be cleaned up once you leave and you will be unable to return. Are you sure you want to leave now?
String.Dest: This Crime Scene will be cleaned up once you leave and you will be unable to return. Are you sure you want to leave now?

String.Source: This action has already been performed.
String.Dest: This action has already been performed.

String.Source: Go to crime scenes to collect clues about your case.
String.Dest: Go to crime scenes to collect clues about your case.

String.Source: Patrol the streets to improve relations with citizens and issue minor citations.
String.Dest: Patrol the streets to improve relations with citizens and issue minor citations.

String.Source: Innocent Sims resent being arrested. So, choose carefully.
String.Dest: Innocent Sims resent being arrested. So, choose carefully.

String.Source: A citizen might be able to provide information about the whereabouts of your suspect.
String.Dest: A citizen might be able to provide information about the whereabouts of your suspect.

String.Source: You've already asked this Sim about the suspect.
String.Dest: You've already asked this Sim about the suspect.

String.Source: Available if ailment Diagnosis requires surgery.
String.Dest: Available if ailment Diagnosis requires surgery.

String.Source: A patient must first be diagnosed before referring them for surgical operation.
String.Dest: A patient must first be diagnosed before referring them for surgical operation.

String.Source: Cannot Scan because Sim is Pregnant.
String.Dest: Cannot Scan because Sim is Pregnant.

String.Source: With the confidential tissue samples obtained, {0.SimFirstName} now needs to test them at the chemical analyzer and document {M0.his}{F0.her} findings to better prepare against a future outbreak
String.Dest: With the confidential tissue samples obtained, {0.SimFirstName} now needs to test them at the chemical analyzer and document {M0.his}{F0.her} findings to better prepare against a future outbreak

String.Source: Are you sure that you want to send your Sim on a House Call? It will transport them to another lot.
String.Dest: Are you sure that you want to send your Sim on a House Call? It will transport them to another lot.

String.Source: Are you sure you want to send your Sim to take care of the outbreak?
String.Dest: Are you sure you want to send your Sim to take care of the outbreak?

String.Source: Click on the prisoner Sim to release them.
String.Dest: Click on the prisoner Sim to release them.

String.Source: This object does not need cleaning yet.
String.Dest: This object does not need cleaning yet.

String.Source: No new diagnostic data can be gained from examinations on this patient.
String.Dest: No new diagnostic data can be gained from examinations on this patient.

String.Source: Even after gathering exam results for {1.SimName}, {0.SimFirstName} was not prepared to give {M0.his}{F0.her} final diagnosis.
String.Dest: Even after gathering exam results for {1.SimName}, {0.SimFirstName} was not prepared to give {M0.his}{F0.her} final diagnosis.

String.Source: Now that {0.SimFirstName} has diagnosed {1.SimName}'s ailment, they can proceed with a shot treatment on an Exam Bed.
String.Dest: Now that {0.SimFirstName} has diagnosed {1.SimName}'s ailment, they can proceed with a shot treatment on an Exam Bed.

String.Source: Now that {0.SimFirstName} has diagnosed {1.SimName}'s illness, they can proceed with a treatment of medication on an Exam Bed.
String.Dest: Now that {0.SimFirstName} has diagnosed {1.SimName}'s illness, they can proceed with a treatment of medication on an Exam Bed.

String.Source: Now that {0.SimFirstName} has diagnosed {1.SimName}'s malady, they can proceed with a treatment operation on a Surgery Table
String.Dest: Now that {0.SimFirstName} has diagnosed {1.SimName}'s malady, they can proceed with a treatment operation on a Surgery Table

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has given {1.SimName} a clean bill-of-health. With no treatment required, {M1.he}{F1.she} can now leave.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has given {1.SimName} a clean bill-of-health. With no treatment required, {M1.he}{F1.she} can now leave.

String.Source: More examinations and tests needed to render a diagnosis.
String.Dest: More examinations and tests needed to render a diagnosis.

String.Source: The treadmill test on {1.SimFirstName} is complete, but unfortunately {0.SimFirstName} cannot make any sense of the results.
String.Dest: The treadmill test on {1.SimFirstName} is complete, but unfortunately {0.SimFirstName} cannot make any sense of the results.

String.Source: Exam result were unavailable due to medical treadmill malfunctioning and breaking during patient testing. Maybe the patients are running too fast the machine can't keep up. Repairs are due.
String.Dest: Exam result were unavailable due to medical treadmill malfunctioning and breaking during patient testing. Maybe the patients are running too fast the machine can't keep up. Repairs are due.

String.Source: The results of the treadmill test on {1.SimFirstName} indicate a possible ailment. Continue with examinations and test if diagnosis is not rendered.
String.Dest: The results of the treadmill test on {1.SimFirstName} indicate a possible ailment. Continue with examinations and test if diagnosis is not rendered.

String.Source: The results of the treadmill test on {1.SimFirstName} clearly show the presence of a treatable ailment. If diagnosis is rendered. Run a few more tests.
String.Dest: The results of the treadmill test on {1.SimFirstName} clearly show the presence of a treatable ailment. If diagnosis is rendered. Run a few more tests.

String.Source: The results of the treadmill test on {1.SimFirstName} are inconclusive. Run test again or different test to get more data.
String.Dest: The results of the treadmill test on {1.SimFirstName} are inconclusive. Run test again or different test to get more data.

String.Source: Only Scientists can puzzle out how to use the Invention Constructor.
String.Dest: Only Scientists can puzzle out how to use the Invention Constructor.

String.Source:
Upgrade complete!
{0.SimFirstName} has finished installing the Invention Constructor upgrade.
String.Dest:
Upgrade complete!
{0.SimFirstName} has finished installing the Invention Constructor upgrade.

String.Source: Reinforce the Invention Constructor with High-Density Panels that protect from breakage.
String.Dest: Reinforce the Invention Constructor with High-Density Panels that protect from breakage.

String.Source: First select "Create Outfit" to choose clothing to dress your mannequin in.
String.Dest: First select "Create Outfit" to choose clothing to dress your mannequin in.

String.Source: Create Outfit in Create A Sim
String.Dest: Create Outfit in Create A Sim

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has just purchased an outfit for {1.Money}.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has just purchased an outfit for {1.Money}.

String.Source: You have reached the max number of this type of outfit. Remove existing outfits in Create A Sim by selecting the clothing category, then clicking the arrow above the category to find a list of all current outfits on the mannequin.
String.Dest: You have reached the max number of this type of outfit. Remove existing outfits in Create A Sim by selecting the clothing category, then clicking the arrow above the category to find a list of all current outfits on the mannequin.

String.Source: Oh no! Something went horribly wrong when {0.SimFirstName} tried to make the {1.ObjectName}!
String.Dest: Oh no! Something went horribly wrong when {0.SimFirstName} tried to make the {1.ObjectName}!

String.Source: This exam has already been performed on this patient
String.Dest: This exam has already been performed on this patient

String.Source: The patient is not hungry right now
String.Dest: The patient is not hungry right now

String.Source: {1.SimName} is still suffering from symptoms after taking the prescribed meds.{0.SimFirstName}'s diagnosis was incorrect and will impact {M0.his}{F0.her} job performance.
String.Dest: {1.SimName} is still suffering from symptoms after taking the prescribed meds.{0.SimFirstName}'s diagnosis was incorrect and will impact {M0.his}{F0.her} job performance.

String.Source: Medication treatment for {1.SimName} was successful and {M1.his}{F1.her} illness treated. {0.SimFirstName} correctly diagnosed the issue, improving job performance.
String.Dest: Medication treatment for {1.SimName} was successful and {M1.his}{F1.her} illness treated. {0.SimFirstName} correctly diagnosed the issue, improving job performance.

String.Source: A patient must be diagnosed with the appropriate illness to receive this treatment.
String.Dest: A patient must be diagnosed with the appropriate illness to receive this treatment.

String.Source: {1.SimName} doesn't appear to be any better following the shot. {0.SimFirstName}'s diagnosis was incorrect and will impact {M0.his}{F0.her} job performance. At least its not a malpractice suit...
String.Dest: {1.SimName} doesn't appear to be any better following the shot. {0.SimFirstName}'s diagnosis was incorrect and will impact {M0.his}{F0.her} job performance. At least its not a malpractice suit...

String.Source: The vaccine for {1.SimName} was successful and {M1.his}{F1.her} illness treated. {0.SimFirstName} correctly diagnosed the issue, improving job performance.
String.Dest: The vaccine for {1.SimName} was successful and {M1.his}{F1.her} illness treated. {0.SimFirstName} correctly diagnosed the issue, improving job performance.

String.Source: This patient has already been diagnosed.
String.Dest: This patient has already been diagnosed.

String.Source: {0.SimName} claimed there is nothing wrong with {1.SimName}. However, {M1.he}{F1.she} still exhibits visible symptoms and has decided to get a second opinion, rather than trusting {M1.his}{F1.her} well-being to {0.SimFirstName}’s incompetence further.
String.Dest: {0.SimName} claimed there is nothing wrong with {1.SimName}. However, {M1.he}{F1.she} still exhibits visible symptoms and has decided to get a second opinion, rather than trusting {M1.his}{F1.her} well-being to {0.SimFirstName}’s incompetence further.

String.Source: Run through a couple medical tests to get to a potential diagnosis faster.
String.Dest: Run through a couple medical tests to get to a potential diagnosis faster.

String.Source: Running all medical tests is more time-consuming, but sure to provide good diagnostic data
String.Dest: Running all medical tests is more time-consuming, but sure to provide good diagnostic data

String.Source: A swab sample has recently been taken from this patient.
String.Dest: A swab sample has recently been taken from this patient.

String.Source: Whoops! {0.SimFirstName} fumbled while trying to get a tissue sample from {1.SimName}. {M0.He}{F0.She} will need to try again with more care (and less hygiene hazards) to get a good patient sample for analysis.
String.Dest: Whoops! {0.SimFirstName} fumbled while trying to get a tissue sample from {1.SimName}. {M0.He}{F0.She} will need to try again with more care (and less hygiene hazards) to get a good patient sample for analysis.

String.Source: A viable tissue sample was successfully collected from {1.SimName}. Now, {0.SimFirstName} must test it in the Chemical Analyzer machine to get data for help with {M0.his}{F0.her} diagnosis.
String.Dest: A viable tissue sample was successfully collected from {1.SimName}. Now, {0.SimFirstName} must test it in the Chemical Analyzer machine to get data for help with {M0.his}{F0.her} diagnosis.

String.Source: After a moment of feeling {1.SimName}’s belly, it is {0.SimFirstName}’s expert opinion and joyful job to announce that {M1.he}{F1.she} is going to have… a little Girl!
String.Dest: After a moment of feeling {1.SimName}’s belly, it is {0.SimFirstName}’s expert opinion and joyful job to announce that {M1.he}{F1.she} is going to have… a little Girl!

String.Source: After a moment of feeling {1.SimName}’s belly, it is {0.SimFirstName}’s expert opinion and joyful job to announce that {M1.he}{F1.she} is going to have… a baby Boy!
String.Dest: After a moment of feeling {1.SimName}’s belly, it is {0.SimFirstName}’s expert opinion and joyful job to announce that {M1.he}{F1.she} is going to have… a baby Boy!

String.Source: Ending an interrogation early will let the suspect go without determining their guilt or innocence. You will have to arrest another suspect at an APB to engage in another interrogation. Do you still want to end this interrogation?
String.Dest: Ending an interrogation early will let the suspect go without determining their guilt or innocence. You will have to arrest another suspect at an APB to engage in another interrogation. Do you still want to end this interrogation?

String.Source: {1.SimFirstName} appears to be guilty! It's time to put this criminal behind bars.
String.Dest: {1.SimFirstName} appears to be guilty! It's time to put this criminal behind bars.

String.Source: {1.SimFirstName} appears to be innocent and can be released!
String.Dest: {1.SimFirstName} appears to be innocent and can be released!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has discovered that {1.SimName} is an Alien! Not even trying to hide it!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has discovered that {1.SimName} is an Alien! Not even trying to hide it!

String.Source: Be Accused of Being an Alien by {1.SimFirstName}
String.Dest: Be Accused of Being an Alien by {1.SimFirstName}

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has learned that the Grim Reaper is stern, but just.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has learned that the Grim Reaper is stern, but just.

String.Source: You've lost job performance for trying to arrest someone that doesn't match the clues for your case. Check the clues in your Notebook to identify likely suspects.
String.Dest: You've lost job performance for trying to arrest someone that doesn't match the clues for your case. Check the clues in your Notebook to identify likely suspects.

String.Source: "You've made a mistake. Get your facts straight before arresting someone!"
String.Dest: "You've made a mistake. Get your facts straight before arresting someone!"

String.Source: The Restaurant has a strict policy against this!
String.Dest: The Restaurant has a strict policy against this!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has activated Angry Town! {M0.He}{F0.She} should be careful not to get on anyones bad side for the next few hours.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has activated Angry Town! {M0.He}{F0.She} should be careful not to get on anyones bad side for the next few hours.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has activated Bladder Epidemic! {M0.He}{F0.She} should find a bathroom soon before they are all taken!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has activated Bladder Epidemic! {M0.He}{F0.She} should find a bathroom soon before they are all taken!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has activated Dance Party! Watch as the neighbors dance the night away.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has activated Dance Party! Watch as the neighbors dance the night away.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has activated Happy Town! Everyone seems so friendly!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has activated Happy Town! Everyone seems so friendly!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has activated Knockout! Why are all the neighbors suddenly so tired?
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has activated Knockout! Why are all the neighbors suddenly so tired?

String.Source: Cross reference crime scene photos and witness reports to see if they can provide clues for your case.
String.Dest: Cross reference crime scene photos and witness reports to see if they can provide clues for your case.

String.Source: When you've been away from home as long as {0.SimFirstName}, you really start to miss the little things.
String.Dest: When you've been away from home as long as {0.SimFirstName}, you really start to miss the little things.

String.Source: It's always nice to see a little piece of home.
String.Dest: It's always nice to see a little piece of home.

String.Source: Sorry to hear that. Feel better soon!
String.Dest: Sorry to hear that. Feel better soon!

String.Source: Uh oh... Better not try this again too soon. Somebody might catch on.
String.Dest: Uh oh... Better not try this again too soon. Somebody might catch on.

String.Source: You don't SOUND sick. Come to work or you may not have a job when you come back!
String.Dest: You don't SOUND sick. Come to work or you may not have a job when you come back!

String.Source: Call in Fake Sick to Work
String.Dest: Call in Fake Sick to Work

String.Source: Thanks for ordering! The medication {0.SimFirstName} purchased can be found in {M0.his}{F0.her} inventory.
String.Dest: Thanks for ordering! The medication {0.SimFirstName} purchased can be found in {M0.his}{F0.her} inventory.

String.Source: Thank you for your purchase! Your items can be found in your inventory.
String.Dest: Thank you for your purchase! Your items can be found in your inventory.

String.Source: I need to report a crime. You see I had this very valuable painting and it was stolen from me in a very elaborate heist. If anyone can find it, it would be you, the best detective in town.
String.Dest: I need to report a crime. You see I had this very valuable painting and it was stolen from me in a very elaborate heist. If anyone can find it, it would be you, the best detective in town.

String.Source: I saw you on the news. You are that amazing detective who has been solving case after case. I know my report is in good hands with you.
String.Dest: I saw you on the news. You are that amazing detective who has been solving case after case. I know my report is in good hands with you.

String.Source: It’s you! May I have your autograph? I don’t even remember why I came here. Oh a crime. Yes, but that can wait. I want to hear all about your latest case!
String.Dest: It’s you! May I have your autograph? I don’t even remember why I came here. Oh a crime. Yes, but that can wait. I want to hear all about your latest case!

String.Source: Miss Snugglepumpkin is up in the tree again. I know you said last time was the last time. But, you wouldn’t let her starve would you, officer?
String.Dest: Miss Snugglepumpkin is up in the tree again. I know you said last time was the last time. But, you wouldn’t let her starve would you, officer?

String.Source: Are YOU really going to be taking my report? Have you even taken the tags out of your uniform yet? Well OK, this weird guy keeps rummaging through my trash can.
String.Dest: Are YOU really going to be taking my report? Have you even taken the tags out of your uniform yet? Well OK, this weird guy keeps rummaging through my trash can.

String.Source: I swear, the other day I was walking around town and everyone was in a bad mood. Someone even tried to fight me. Tell your superiors we need more officers keeping the peace.
String.Dest: I swear, the other day I was walking around town and everyone was in a bad mood. Someone even tried to fight me. Tell your superiors we need more officers keeping the peace.

String.Source: Did you just get your badge? Would it be possible to speak to a more senior officer? Well alright…
String.Dest: Did you just get your badge? Would it be possible to speak to a more senior officer? Well alright…

String.Source: Some kids have been running through the neighborhood pool jumping. What do you mean that sounds like fun!? They are trespassing!
String.Dest: Some kids have been running through the neighborhood pool jumping. What do you mean that sounds like fun!? They are trespassing!

String.Source: Are you fresh out of the academy? At least you can put on a uniform right side out. That’s a start. Alright I need to report a crime. You see there has been a theft… my heart…
String.Dest: Are you fresh out of the academy? At least you can put on a uniform right side out. That’s a start. Alright I need to report a crime. You see there has been a theft… my heart…

String.Source: I want to report a crime. Some little hooligan has been knocking over my trash can in the night. Thank you so much for hearing me out. I know there are probably more important things you could be doing.
String.Dest: I want to report a crime. Some little hooligan has been knocking over my trash can in the night. Thank you so much for hearing me out. I know there are probably more important things you could be doing.

String.Source: Some troublemakers have been smashing my mailbox. Do something!
String.Dest: Some troublemakers have been smashing my mailbox. Do something!

String.Source: Sir, I know this is going to sound crazy, but I saw my neighbor out in his front yard the other night. Then there was this bright light and he was gone. The next day he seemed… different.
String.Dest: Sir, I know this is going to sound crazy, but I saw my neighbor out in his front yard the other night. Then there was this bright light and he was gone. The next day he seemed… different.

String.Source: I saw someone playing with matches near the trashcan in the park. If they don’t change their ways, those pyromaniacs are going to grow up to be arsonists someday.
String.Dest: I saw someone playing with matches near the trashcan in the park. If they don’t change their ways, those pyromaniacs are going to grow up to be arsonists someday.

String.Source: I saw these delinquents steal some cans of spray paint. They are up to no good officer. They are going to vandalize something. You have to do something.
String.Dest: I saw these delinquents steal some cans of spray paint. They are up to no good officer. They are going to vandalize something. You have to do something.

String.Source: Web ads provide a large initial spike in foot traffic that trails off near the end.
String.Dest: Web ads provide a large initial spike in foot traffic that trails off near the end.

String.Source: Let the current ad campaign finish before purchasing more advertising.
String.Dest: Let the current ad campaign finish before purchasing more advertising.

String.Source: TV ads provide a consistent boost to foot traffic until they end.
String.Dest: TV ads provide a consistent boost to foot traffic until they end.

String.Source: This object is currently in use.
String.Dest: This object is currently in use.

String.Source: There are no available lots to purchase.
String.Dest: There are no available lots to purchase.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has fired {1.SimFirstName}. {M1.He}{F1.She} will no longer show up for work. {M1.He's}{F1.She's} also pretty angry.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has fired {1.SimFirstName}. {M1.He}{F1.She} will no longer show up for work. {M1.He's}{F1.She's} also pretty angry.

String.Source:
The store is open and customers are on their way to peruse {0.SimFirstName}'s merchandise.
Any hired employees will be arriving momentarily; be sure to assign them a task to perform during their shift.
String.Dest:
The store is open and customers are on their way to peruse {0.SimFirstName}'s merchandise.
Any hired employees will be arriving momentarily; be sure to assign them a task to perform during their shift.

String.Source: You cannot sell the store while it is open.
String.Dest: You cannot sell the store while it is open.

String.Source: Mark this item for sale. Customers will only browse and buy items that are for sale.
String.Dest: Mark this item for sale. Customers will only browse and buy items that are for sale.

String.Source: Take all of {0.SimFirstName}'s Simoleons out of the Safe before selling it!
String.Dest: Take all of {0.SimFirstName}'s Simoleons out of the Safe before selling it!

String.Source: Design Female Uniform in Create A Sim
String.Dest: Design Female Uniform in Create A Sim

String.Source: Design Male Uniform in Create A Sim
String.Dest: Design Male Uniform in Create A Sim

String.Source: Design Uniform for {1.SimFirstName} in Create A Sim
String.Dest: Design Uniform for {1.SimFirstName} in Create A Sim

String.Source: The ship hurtles through the wormhole and emerges near an alien planet. A series of odd noises comes from the on-ship radio, and {0.SimFirstName} is suddenly teleported off {M0.his}{F0.her} ship!
String.Dest: The ship hurtles through the wormhole and emerges near an alien planet. A series of odd noises comes from the on-ship radio, and {0.SimFirstName} is suddenly teleported off {M0.his}{F0.her} ship!

String.Source: Serums are unlocked by breakthroughs. Try Experimenting on the Chemistry Lab in order to have a Breakthrough.
String.Dest: Serums are unlocked by breakthroughs. Try Experimenting on the Chemistry Lab in order to have a Breakthrough.

String.Source: To create Tainted Serums you must first test a normal serum 3 times on your own Sim or others. (Test Serum is a Friendly social)
String.Dest: To create Tainted Serums you must first test a normal serum 3 times on your own Sim or others. (Test Serum is a Friendly social)

String.Source: Have some breakthroughs to discover new inventions. Try reading books, taking showers, and doing creative things!
String.Dest: Have some breakthroughs to discover new inventions. Try reading books, taking showers, and doing creative things!

String.Source: Only Scientists understand how to use the Chemistry Lab.
String.Dest: Only Scientists understand how to use the Chemistry Lab.

String.Source: This looks dangerous; it'd be safer to get more experience before pushing it.
String.Dest: This looks dangerous; it'd be safer to get more experience before pushing it.

String.Source: Hello, {1.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} reporting that my experiments have led to some {2.ObjectName}.
String.Dest: Hello, {1.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} reporting that my experiments have led to some {2.ObjectName}.

String.Source: Hello, {1.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} reporting that my experiments have failed.
String.Dest: Hello, {1.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} reporting that my experiments have failed.

String.Source:
Upgrade complete!

String.Source: Your Sim's brain is feeling too drained to do this right now.
String.Dest: Your Sim's brain is feeling too drained to do this right now.

String.Source: This place is terrible! I can't stand it anymore! I quit!
String.Dest: This place is terrible! I can't stand it anymore! I quit!

String.Source: Do you know what you can do with this job? You can take it and.... and.... hire someone else to do it. I quit!
String.Dest: Do you know what you can do with this job? You can take it and.... and.... hire someone else to do it. I quit!

String.Source: I can't stand working here anymore! Hire someone else to deal with all of this! I quit!
String.Dest: I can't stand working here anymore! Hire someone else to deal with all of this! I quit!

String.Source: I hate this job and everything about the retail world. I quit!
String.Dest: I hate this job and everything about the retail world. I quit!

String.Source: Why do I still work here? I'm leaving!
String.Dest: Why do I still work here? I'm leaving!

String.Source: {1.SimFirstName} cannot be demoted any further. You may want to consider firing {M1.him}{F1.her}!
String.Dest: {1.SimFirstName} cannot be demoted any further. You may want to consider firing {M1.him}{F1.her}!

String.Source: A demotion? Wait, you're serious? Listen, I get that the economy is bad, but you can't just take it out on me {M0.Mr.}{F0.Ms.} {0.SimLastName}. Maybe I need to reconsider my employment here...
String.Dest: A demotion? Wait, you're serious? Listen, I get that the economy is bad, but you can't just take it out on me {M0.Mr.}{F0.Ms.} {0.SimLastName}. Maybe I need to reconsider my employment here...

String.Source: Great! That's just GREAT. Oh... I'm sorry, were you having trouble picking up on my SARCASM? Slack off for one short minute and you decide to demote me? I've been making Simoleons for this place hand over fist! This is outrageous!
String.Dest: Great! That's just GREAT. Oh... I'm sorry, were you having trouble picking up on my SARCASM? Slack off for one short minute and you decide to demote me? I've been making Simoleons for this place hand over fist! This is outrageous!

String.Source: Oh... no... you're really demoting me? No write up? No review? Is this how you treat every employee around here or just me?
String.Dest: Oh... no... you're really demoting me? No write up? No review? Is this how you treat every employee around here or just me?

String.Source: Oh sure, the corporate fat cat comes down from {M0.his}{F0.her} ivory tower to pass judgement on the little {M1.man}{F1.woman} - how typical. Yeah that's right, you heard me... I didn't stutter and I'm certainly not apologizing after you just demoted me!
String.Dest: Oh sure, the corporate fat cat comes down from {M0.his}{F0.her} ivory tower to pass judgement on the little {M1.man}{F1.woman} - how typical. Yeah that's right, you heard me... I didn't stutter and I'm certainly not apologizing after you just demoted me!

String.Source: How could you demote me after all I've done for this store? I give my blood, sweat, and tears EVERY SINGLE DAY and this is the thanks I get?
String.Dest: How could you demote me after all I've done for this store? I give my blood, sweat, and tears EVERY SINGLE DAY and this is the thanks I get?

String.Source: This employee has been praised recently.
String.Dest: This employee has been praised recently.

String.Source: {1.SimFirstName} is already promoted to the highest possible position.
String.Dest: {1.SimFirstName} is already promoted to the highest possible position.

String.Source: Wow, I certainly wasn't expecting a promotion just out of the blue like this. You have no idea how much this raise means to me! {M0.Mr.}{F0.Ms.} {0.SimLastName}, let me just say... Boss. Of. The. Year! Thank you!
String.Dest: Wow, I certainly wasn't expecting a promotion just out of the blue like this. You have no idea how much this raise means to me! {M0.Mr.}{F0.Ms.} {0.SimLastName}, let me just say... Boss. Of. The. Year! Thank you!

String.Source: A promotion? For me?? I... well of course! It's about time! I mean... thank you {M0.Mr.}{F0.Ms.} {0.SimLastName}, it's an honor!
String.Dest: A promotion? For me?? I... well of course! It's about time! I mean... thank you {M0.Mr.}{F0.Ms.} {0.SimLastName}, it's an honor!

String.Source: Thank you so much for the promotion {M0.Mr.}{F0.Ms.} {0.SimLastName}. I've really been putting in a lot of effort lately, and I promise that I'll live up to this new responsibility you've trusted me with.
String.Dest: Thank you so much for the promotion {M0.Mr.}{F0.Ms.} {0.SimLastName}. I've really been putting in a lot of effort lately, and I promise that I'll live up to this new responsibility you've trusted me with.

String.Source: Hard work DOES pay off! It's nice to know that there's room for career growth at this store. Thank you {M0.sir}{F0.ma'am}, I promise I won't let you down!
String.Dest: Hard work DOES pay off! It's nice to know that there's room for career growth at this store. Thank you {M0.sir}{F0.ma'am}, I promise I won't let you down!

String.Source: Promoted! This calls for a celebration! A round on me for all my friends at the juice bar! Oh... I... Of course I'd invite you along {M0.Mr.}{F0.Ms.} {0.SimLastName}, but you know those HR rules about boss and employee interactions outside of work, and uhhh... I'm sorry, I didn't mean to make it awkward... Thank you!
String.Dest: Promoted! This calls for a celebration! A round on me for all my friends at the juice bar! Oh... I... Of course I'd invite you along {M0.Mr.}{F0.Ms.} {0.SimLastName}, but you know those HR rules about boss and employee interactions outside of work, and uhhh... I'm sorry, I didn't mean to make it awkward... Thank you!

String.Dest:
