String.Source: Welcome to a world in which beautiful scenery meets metropolitan life! Magnolia Promenade offers fantastic views and a top of the line shopping experience for customers and entrepreneurs alike.
String.Dest: Welcome to a world in which beautiful scenery meets metropolitan life! Magnolia Promenade offers fantastic views and a top of the line shopping experience for customers and entrepreneurs alike.

String.Source: One and the same down to every detail...
String.Dest: One and the same down to every detail...

String.Source:
This customer is showing interest in a number of items in the store.
Continue selecting retail socials to help steer them toward a purchase.
String.Dest:
This customer is showing interest in a number of items in the store.
Continue selecting retail socials to help steer them toward a purchase.

String.Source:
This customer is just looking around.
Let them know about your merchandise to get them interested in buying.
String.Dest:
This customer is just looking around.
Let them know about your merchandise to get them interested in buying.

String.Source:
This customer is just about to buy something.
Lavish them with a bit more attention to close the deal!
String.Dest:
This customer is just about to buy something.
Lavish them with a bit more attention to close the deal!

String.Source: You can now Give Medical Advice
String.Dest: You can now Give Medical Advice

String.Source: You can now Give Bad Medical Advice with Level 3 Mischief
String.Dest: You can now Give Bad Medical Advice with Level 3 Mischief

String.Source: Can Now Determine Baby Gender on Pregnant Sims
String.Dest: Can Now Determine Baby Gender on Pregnant Sims

String.Source: Good work so far! We're one step closer to solving this case. We have some solid intel and a good idea where to look for our suspect. Let's take this perp down!
String.Dest: Good work so far! We're one step closer to solving this case. We have some solid intel and a good idea where to look for our suspect. Let's take this perp down!

String.Source: The pieces are starting to line up. We have a few clues, but no provable theories yet. Perhaps the next step would be to round up the usual suspects?
String.Dest: The pieces are starting to line up. We have a few clues, but no provable theories yet. Perhaps the next step would be to round up the usual suspects?

String.Source: Ready to learn the ropes, Rookie? You'll be introduced to a variety of tasks that will help to maintain law and order and improve the quality of life for all. Pretty noble stuff!
String.Dest: Ready to learn the ropes, Rookie? You'll be introduced to a variety of tasks that will help to maintain law and order and improve the quality of life for all. Pretty noble stuff!

String.Source: Learning the ropes on the first day was great preparation for a day of patrols! Now it's time to find out how to handle one's self in the real world. Stay on your toes!
String.Dest: Learning the ropes on the first day was great preparation for a day of patrols! Now it's time to find out how to handle one's self in the real world. Stay on your toes!

String.Source: You've completed your training and acquired the skills needed to really help this town. Now it's time to put your newfound knowledge to the test and embark upon your first case!
String.Dest: You've completed your training and acquired the skills needed to really help this town. Now it's time to put your newfound knowledge to the test and embark upon your first case!

String.Source: There's a strong suspect, but did they really do it? It's time to really dig deep with the right line of questioning to get the proof we need to seal this case!
String.Dest: There's a strong suspect, but did they really do it? It's time to really dig deep with the right line of questioning to get the proof we need to seal this case!

String.Source: Congratulations on your last case. Ready to celebrate with another one? I'd love to have an office party, but right now we're kind of busy trying to save this town. Stop being so selfish.
String.Dest: Congratulations on your last case. Ready to celebrate with another one? I'd love to have an office party, but right now we're kind of busy trying to save this town. Stop being so selfish.

String.Source: No Clues, No Suspects, No Problem
String.Dest: No Clues, No Suspects, No Problem

String.Source: Any evidence? No. Any suspects? No. Any leads? No. Come one! Get moving before the trail gets too cold!
String.Dest: Any evidence? No. Any suspects? No. Any leads? No. Come one! Get moving before the trail gets too cold!

String.Source: Everyone called in sick! Juggle patients rounds and other tasks the care staff would typically assist in. You may need to "call in sick" too after a day like this.
String.Dest: Everyone called in sick! Juggle patients rounds and other tasks the care staff would typically assist in. You may need to "call in sick" too after a day like this.

String.Source: It takes a while to get situated to new tasks. Complete your rounds and help get ailing patients tested for diagnosis. Your diligence will help make patients feel better in to time. Helping Sims never felt better.
String.Dest: It takes a while to get situated to new tasks. Complete your rounds and help get ailing patients tested for diagnosis. Your diligence will help make patients feel better in to time. Helping Sims never felt better.

String.Source: Hectic Day of Patient Care Rounds
String.Dest: Hectic Day of Patient Care Rounds

String.Source: Higher work titles mean more responsibilities. Work a full day doing examinations and tests in order to properly diagnose and treat patients.
String.Dest: Higher work titles mean more responsibilities. Work a full day doing examinations and tests in order to properly diagnose and treat patients.

String.Source: New to the medical field? Take the time to get to know the people, responsibilities and roles.
String.Dest: New to the medical field? Take the time to get to know the people, responsibilities and roles.

String.Source: Research has shown that there are life forms just beyond our solar system. Someone should investigate the strange anomaly.
String.Dest: Research has shown that there are life forms just beyond our solar system. Someone should investigate the strange anomaly.

String.Source: There seem to be some unexpected visitors at the Lab today. Better make sure they do not cause any trouble.
String.Dest: There seem to be some unexpected visitors at the Lab today. Better make sure they do not cause any trouble.

String.Source: Today could be the day for a new Breakthrough! Start experimenting to get the wheels turning.
String.Dest: Today could be the day for a new Breakthrough! Start experimenting to get the wheels turning.

String.Source: It is time to see what this SimRay is really capable of.
String.Dest: It is time to see what this SimRay is really capable of.

String.Source: FutureSim Labs seems to be running low on supplies. Today is the day to restock and see what new materials we can find in the world.
String.Dest: FutureSim Labs seems to be running low on supplies. Today is the day to restock and see what new materials we can find in the world.

String.Source: There comes a time in every good scientists career when they have to make a choice. Will they use their knowledge for Good or Evil?
String.Dest: There comes a time in every good scientists career when they have to make a choice. Will they use their knowledge for Good or Evil?

String.Source: Tired of waiting for proper medical care, a patient has taken their health needs elsewhere - likely into their own untrained hands. May need to pick up the pace at work or patients will continue to leave.
String.Dest: Tired of waiting for proper medical care, a patient has taken their health needs elsewhere - likely into their own untrained hands. May need to pick up the pace at work or patients will continue to leave.

String.Source: Patient Neglect! After being ignored for over an hour by hospital staff, the collapsed Sim begrudgingly picked themselves up and left the hospital. Hopefully they will be ok. Why didn't you help them?
String.Dest: Patient Neglect! After being ignored for over an hour by hospital staff, the collapsed Sim begrudgingly picked themselves up and left the hospital. Hopefully they will be ok. Why didn't you help them?

String.Source: A pregnant patient could not wait any longer to be admitted for delivery and has left the clinic to give birth elsewhere
String.Dest: A pregnant patient could not wait any longer to be admitted for delivery and has left the clinic to give birth elsewhere

String.Source: Due to the urgency of getting the batch of delivered tissue samples analyzed, the hospital staff was forced to quickly out source this job to another lab, as {0.SimFirstName} could not break away to do this emergency work
String.Dest: Due to the urgency of getting the batch of delivered tissue samples analyzed, the hospital staff was forced to quickly out source this job to another lab, as {0.SimFirstName} could not break away to do this emergency work

String.Source: What choice! What value! I'm ready to buy when you get a chance to ring me up.
String.Dest: What choice! What value! I'm ready to buy when you get a chance to ring me up.

String.Source: You cannot travel while giving birth at the hospital.
String.Dest: You cannot travel while giving birth at the hospital.

String.Source: Scour the crime scene to finds clues that lead to the perpetrator.
String.Dest: Scour the crime scene to finds clues that lead to the perpetrator.

String.Source: Use interrogation actions on the suspect until you are able to determine whether they are guilty or innocent.
String.Dest: Use interrogation actions on the suspect until you are able to determine whether they are guilty or innocent.

String.Source: Breakthroughs come from doing creative or scientific activities, like Experimenting, Analyzing, or even a thoughtful shower!
String.Dest: Breakthroughs come from doing creative or scientific activities, like Experimenting, Analyzing, or even a thoughtful shower!

String.Source: Add Clues to the Crime Map
String.Dest: Add Clues to the Crime Map

String.Source: Analyze Evidence or Cross-Reference Witness Reports to get Analyzed Evidence that you can add to the Crime Map.
String.Dest: Analyze Evidence or Cross-Reference Witness Reports to get Analyzed Evidence that you can add to the Crime Map.

String.Source: Add More Clues To The Crime Map
String.Dest: Add More Clues To The Crime Map

String.Source: Add more clues to the crime map to increase the chance of finding the suspect during the APB.
String.Dest: Add more clues to the crime map to increase the chance of finding the suspect during the APB.

String.Source: Clues from crime scenes can be Analyzed at the Chemical Analyzer in the Police Station.
String.Dest: Clues from crime scenes can be Analyzed at the Chemical Analyzer in the Police Station.

String.Source: Find and Arrest a suspect that fits the clues in your Notebook.
String.Dest: Find and Arrest a suspect that fits the clues in your Notebook.

String.Source: Get Criminals' Fingerprints at Booking Station
String.Dest: Get Criminals' Fingerprints at Booking Station

String.Source: Use the Booking Station to get a Criminal's Fingerprints
String.Dest: Use the Booking Station to get a Criminal's Fingerprints

String.Source: Take Mugshots at the Booking Station
String.Dest: Take Mugshots at the Booking Station

String.Source: Use the Booking Station to get Criminals' Mugshots
String.Dest: Use the Booking Station to get Criminals' Mugshots

String.Source: Search Criminals at the Booking Station
String.Dest: Search Criminals at the Booking Station

String.Source: Use the Booking Station to Search Criminals
String.Dest: Use the Booking Station to Search Criminals

String.Source: Use a computer to Browse the Police Database.
String.Dest: Use a computer to Browse the Police Database.

String.Source: Collect Clues at the Crime Scene
String.Dest: Collect Clues at the Crime Scene

String.Source: Collect Evidence Samples or Dust for Prints to find clues which can help solve the case.
String.Dest: Collect Evidence Samples or Dust for Prints to find clues which can help solve the case.

String.Source: Collect Evidence Samples, Dust for Prints, or Take Witness Reports to find clues which can help solve the case.
String.Dest: Collect Evidence Samples, Dust for Prints, or Take Witness Reports to find clues which can help solve the case.

String.Source:
Nice work! Analyzing evidence from the Crime Scene allows you to discover clues about the suspect.
Once you're running your own case, you'll have to analyze lots of evidence before you can find the suspect.
For now, use a computer to File the Crime Scene Evidence so that the senior detective can take over.
String.Dest:
Nice work! Analyzing evidence from the Crime Scene allows you to discover clues about the suspect.
Once you're running your own case, you'll have to analyze lots of evidence before you can find the suspect.
For now, use a computer to File the Crime Scene Evidence so that the senior detective can take over.

String.Source: Use the Chemical Analyzer to get clues from evidence found at the Crime Scene
String.Dest: Use the Chemical Analyzer to get clues from evidence found at the Crime Scene

String.Source: You need to learn the ropes before you can handle running your own case. You'll start by assisting a veteran detective with a crime scene investigation. Use the Crime Map to travel to the crime scene.
String.Dest: You need to learn the ropes before you can handle running your own case. You'll start by assisting a veteran detective with a crime scene investigation. Use the Crime Map to travel to the crime scene.

String.Source: Assist with a Crime Scene Investigation
String.Dest: Assist with a Crime Scene Investigation

String.Source:
Good work! The evidence you found will be helpful to the detective in charge of this case.
Once you get your own case, you'll have to follow up on the evidence yourself.
Tomorrow, you'll learn about the next steps in a case.
For now, take some time to help process criminals here at the station.
String.Dest:
Good work! The evidence you found will be helpful to the detective in charge of this case.
Once you get your own case, you'll have to follow up on the evidence yourself.
Tomorrow, you'll learn about the next steps in a case.
For now, take some time to help process criminals here at the station.

String.Source: File Crime Scene Evidence at a Computer
String.Dest: File Crime Scene Evidence at a Computer

String.Source: Use a Computer to turn in the clues you found at the crime scene.
String.Dest: Use a Computer to turn in the clues you found at the crime scene.

String.Source: Get to know the community by chatting with civilians.
String.Dest: Get to know the community by chatting with civilians.

String.Source: Talk with other officers to share ideas about your case.
String.Dest: Talk with other officers to share ideas about your case.

String.Source: Use the Computer to Cross Reference Photos or Witness Reports. You might find pertinent information for your case.
String.Dest: Use the Computer to Cross Reference Photos or Witness Reports. You might find pertinent information for your case.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has been assigned a new case! Use the Crime Map to travel to the scene of the crime and start the investigation.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has been assigned a new case! Use the Crime Map to travel to the scene of the crime and start the investigation.

String.Source: Use a computer to Get a Case Assignment.
String.Dest: Use a computer to Get a Case Assignment.

String.Source: Collect More Clues at the Crime Scene
String.Dest: Collect More Clues at the Crime Scene

String.Source: Check in with the chief at the police station. Hopefully by now you're tough enough to take a brow beating.
String.Dest: Check in with the chief at the police station. Hopefully by now you're tough enough to take a brow beating.

String.Source: Take a Police Report from a Civilian
String.Dest: Take a Police Report from a Civilian

String.Source: Civilians come to the station to report crimes. Talk with them to get their report on file.
String.Dest: Civilians come to the station to report crimes. Talk with them to get their report on file.

String.Source: It's important to stay fit! Exercise in the gym upstairs or go jogging.
String.Dest: It's important to stay fit! Exercise in the gym upstairs or go jogging.

String.Source: The Crime Map can be used to Go to Crime Scenes.
String.Dest: The Crime Map can be used to Go to Crime Scenes.

String.Source: After arresting a suspect you can use the interrogation tables to interrogate them.
String.Dest: After arresting a suspect you can use the interrogation tables to interrogate them.

String.Source: Use the Crime Map to issue an APB. The more clues you add before issuing the APB, the better chance you'll have to catch the suspect.
String.Dest: Use the Crime Map to issue an APB. The more clues you add before issuing the APB, the better chance you'll have to catch the suspect.

String.Source: Issue a citation to Sims who are littering or fighting.
String.Dest: Issue a citation to Sims who are littering or fighting.

String.Source: Issue a citation to a Sim that has recently been in a fight.
String.Dest: Issue a citation to a Sim that has recently been in a fight.

String.Source: When you are ready, click on your Sim to Return to the Police Station
String.Dest: When you are ready, click on your Sim to Return to the Police Station

String.Source: Click on the suspect to lock them up.
String.Dest: Click on the suspect to lock them up.

String.Source: Spending time on patrol is a chance to help the community... or to shrug off your duty and have fun. Your choice.
String.Dest: Spending time on patrol is a chance to help the community... or to shrug off your duty and have fun. Your choice.

String.Source: Question Citizens to Find the Suspect
String.Dest: Question Citizens to Find the Suspect

String.Source: The suspect is innocent. Click on them to release them.
String.Dest: The suspect is innocent. Click on them to release them.

String.Source: Help build a positive relationship between the community and the police.
String.Dest: Help build a positive relationship between the community and the police.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has set up the map for the newest case. Now would be a good time to travel to the first crime scene.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has set up the map for the newest case. Now would be a good time to travel to the first crime scene.

String.Source: Set up the crime map for the current case.
String.Dest: Set up the crime map for the current case.

String.Source: Patrol the streets to improve community relationships and issue citations.
String.Dest: Patrol the streets to improve community relationships and issue citations.

String.Source: Look for evidence of the crime, then Take a Picture to gather info for your case.
String.Dest: Look for evidence of the crime, then Take a Picture to gather info for your case.

String.Source: Get a Report from a Witness
String.Dest: Get a Report from a Witness

String.Source: Talk to witnesses to get a report on the crime.
String.Dest: Talk to witnesses to get a report on the crime.

String.Source: Refer Patient into an Exam Bed
String.Dest: Refer Patient into an Exam Bed

String.Source: Analyze the Patient's Swabbed Sample at the Chemical Analyzer.
String.Dest: Analyze the Patient's Swabbed Sample at the Chemical Analyzer.

String.Source: A dirty lab station leads to an unhygienic work environment and contaminated data
String.Dest: A dirty lab station leads to an unhygienic work environment and contaminated data

String.Source: Sharpen those organic-chemistry skills by spending some time practicing analysis at a chemical analyzer station
String.Dest: Sharpen those organic-chemistry skills by spending some time practicing analysis at a chemical analyzer station

String.Source: A functional hospital relies on functioning equipment. Fix up any broken objects, from the Chemical Analyzer and Medical Treadmill to the work computers to maintain your workplace in mint condition.
String.Dest: A functional hospital relies on functioning equipment. Fix up any broken objects, from the Chemical Analyzer and Medical Treadmill to the work computers to maintain your workplace in mint condition.

String.Source: A clean clinic is a functional clinic. Click on a puddle and select Mop.
String.Dest: A clean clinic is a functional clinic. Click on a puddle and select Mop.

String.Source: Take some time to type up the data from the recent sample analysis at a computer
String.Dest: Take some time to type up the data from the recent sample analysis at a computer

String.Source: At a work computer, enter the results from the chemical analysis of the delivered samples to better prepare for future outbreaks.
String.Dest: At a work computer, enter the results from the chemical analysis of the delivered samples to better prepare for future outbreaks.

String.Source: Use a work computer to stay on top of the latest medical news and research available online.
String.Dest: Use a work computer to stay on top of the latest medical news and research available online.

String.Source: Use a work computer to update the medical records of the recently treated patient
String.Dest: Use a work computer to update the medical records of the recently treated patient

String.Source: A pregnant Sim has arrived at the hospital ready to give birth. Helping to bring a new life into the world is the highest priority.
String.Dest: A pregnant Sim has arrived at the hospital ready to give birth. Helping to bring a new life into the world is the highest priority.

String.Source: Once properly examined, a patient can be diagnosed while seated on an Exam Bed
String.Dest: Once properly examined, a patient can be diagnosed while seated on an Exam Bed

String.Source: Discuss General Health with Admited Patient
String.Dest: Discuss General Health with Admited Patient

String.Source: It is important to educate patients on proper health practices while they are admitted to an Exam Bed
String.Dest: It is important to educate patients on proper health practices while they are admitted to an Exam Bed

String.Source: Check ears of a patient seated on an Exam Bed.
String.Dest: Check ears of a patient seated on an Exam Bed.

String.Source: Examine the eyes of a patient seated on a hospital bed.
String.Dest: Examine the eyes of a patient seated on a hospital bed.

String.Source: Click on a messy Exam Bed and select Make Bed to get it ready for a new patient.
String.Dest: Click on a messy Exam Bed and select Make Bed to get it ready for a new patient.

String.Source: Deliver Food to a Patient on the Exam Bed
String.Dest: Deliver Food to a Patient on the Exam Bed

String.Source: Sick Sims need to eat too. Make sure to Deliver Food to a hungry Patient on the exam bed in a timely manner.
String.Dest: Sick Sims need to eat too. Make sure to Deliver Food to a hungry Patient on the exam bed in a timely manner.

String.Source: Locate a Sim who has been diagnosed with an illness that requires treatment with medication. Click on the patient, select "Treat with Medication."
String.Dest: Locate a Sim who has been diagnosed with an illness that requires treatment with medication. Click on the patient, select "Treat with Medication."

String.Source: Locate a Sim who has been diagnosed with an illness that requires a shot treatment. Diagnosed Patients have red hearts over their head and can be treated with a shot via the "Treat" submenu.
String.Dest: Locate a Sim who has been diagnosed with an illness that requires a shot treatment. Diagnosed Patients have red hearts over their head and can be treated with a shot via the "Treat" submenu.

String.Source: Scan Body of a patient using a medical probe to check the vitals of a patient seated on an Exam Bed.
String.Dest: Scan Body of a patient using a medical probe to check the vitals of a patient seated on an Exam Bed.

String.Source: Take temperature of a patient waiting on an Exam Bed.
String.Dest: Take temperature of a patient waiting on an Exam Bed.

String.Source: When staffing the front desk carefully manage the influx of patients by checking them in, greeting the ailed patients and staff.
String.Dest: When staffing the front desk carefully manage the influx of patients by checking them in, greeting the ailed patients and staff.

String.Source: Take a shift at the front desk, supporting the medical staff and managing the flow of patients
String.Dest: Take a shift at the front desk, supporting the medical staff and managing the flow of patients

String.Source: Stay focused and energized to better deal with a full day of intense clinical work
String.Dest: Stay focused and energized to better deal with a full day of intense clinical work

String.Source: Grab a Snack between seeing patients
String.Dest: Grab a Snack between seeing patients

String.Source: Get a quick bite from the fridge to keep your Sim from getting hungry
String.Dest: Get a quick bite from the fridge to keep your Sim from getting hungry

String.Source: Perform a Treadmill Test on a Patient
String.Dest: Perform a Treadmill Test on a Patient

String.Source: Many medical issues reveal themselves under strenuous conditions. So grab a patient and get them running for diagnosis data
String.Dest: Many medical issues reveal themselves under strenuous conditions. So grab a patient and get them running for diagnosis data

String.Source: Whether you like them or not, it's important to introduce yourself to your Co-workers.
String.Dest: Whether you like them or not, it's important to introduce yourself to your Co-workers.

String.Source: Successfully Swab for a sample on patients waiting on Exam Beds. Dropping a sample will taint the sample so make sure it's a good one.
String.Dest: Successfully Swab for a sample on patients waiting on Exam Beds. Dropping a sample will taint the sample so make sure it's a good one.

String.Source: Once diagnosed, Patients can be treated while Reclined on the Exam Bed, or at a Surgery Table
String.Dest: Once diagnosed, Patients can be treated while Reclined on the Exam Bed, or at a Surgery Table

String.Source: Cleanliness is critical when working with sick patients. Maintain good hygiene with regular scrubbing.
String.Dest: Cleanliness is critical when working with sick patients. Maintain good hygiene with regular scrubbing.

String.Source: Make sure that the X-Ray Machine is in good working order. Click on the X-Ray Machine, and select Calibrate.
String.Dest: Make sure that the X-Ray Machine is in good working order. Click on the X-Ray Machine, and select Calibrate.

String.Source: Broken medical equipments helps no one - get that scanning devices serviced pronto
String.Dest: Broken medical equipments helps no one - get that scanning devices serviced pronto

String.Source: Advanced examination of a patient's potential ailments can be done through an X-ray scan
String.Dest: Advanced examination of a patient's potential ailments can be done through an X-ray scan

String.Source: The Crime Map can be used to Go on Patrol.
String.Dest: The Crime Map can be used to Go on Patrol.

String.Source: New goals will unlock after completing your active goals.
String.Dest: New goals will unlock after completing your active goals.

String.Source: Use the Crime Map to issue an APB. The more clues you add before issuing the APB, the better chance you'll have to catch the suspect.
String.Dest: Use the Crime Map to issue an APB. The more clues you add before issuing the APB, the better chance you'll have to catch the suspect.

String.Source: New goals will unlock after completing your active goals.
String.Dest: New goals will unlock after completing your active goals.

String.Source: New goals will unlock after completing your active goals.
String.Dest: New goals will unlock after completing your active goals.

String.Source: Patrol the streets to improve community relationships and issue citations.
String.Dest: Patrol the streets to improve community relationships and issue citations.

String.Source: New goals will unlock after completing your active goals.
String.Dest: New goals will unlock after completing your active goals.

String.Source: New goals will unlock after completing your active goals.
String.Dest: New goals will unlock after completing your active goals.

String.Source:
Now that you've gathered evidence from the Crime Scene, it's time to start tracking down a suspect.
Use the Chemical Analyzer and Computer to evaluate the evidence you found at the Crime Scene.
There's a chance you'll discover some information about who committed the crime.
String.Dest:
Now that you've gathered evidence from the Crime Scene, it's time to start tracking down a suspect.
Use the Chemical Analyzer and Computer to evaluate the evidence you found at the Crime Scene.
There's a chance you'll discover some information about who committed the crime.

String.Source: When you are ready, click on your Sim to Return to the Police Station.
String.Dest: When you are ready, click on your Sim to Return to the Police Station.

String.Dest: New goals will unlock after completing your active goals.

String.Source:
Employees who are proficient at maintenance will be faster at restocking items and cleaning the store.
Employees increase their Maintenance Skill after being assigned to Clean The Store, or to Restock Sold Items.
String.Dest:
Employees who are proficient at maintenance will be faster at restocking items and cleaning the store.
Employees increase their Maintenance Skill after being assigned to Clean The Store, or to Restock Sold Items.

String.Source:
Employees with low work ethic will play with their phones, socialize with other employees, or just have fun while slacking off.
If you catch an employee slacking, Assign a Work Task to get them back to work.
You can raise an employee's Work Ethic Skill over time by providing them with managerial feedback, such as offering Praise, Criticism, Checking Up On them, or by Berating them when you catch them slacking.
String.Dest:
Employees with low work ethic will play with their phones, socialize with other employees, or just have fun while slacking off.
If you catch an employee slacking, Assign a Work Task to get them back to work.
You can raise an employee's Work Ethic Skill over time by providing them with managerial feedback, such as offering Praise, Criticism, Checking Up On them, or by Berating them when you catch them slacking.

String.Source:
Employees who are skilled at sales will have greater success interacting with customers, and will ring up shoppers faster once they're ready to buy.
Employees increase their Retail Sales Skill after being assigned to Answer Customers' Questions, or to Ring Up Customers.
String.Dest:
Employees who are skilled at sales will have greater success interacting with customers, and will ring up shoppers faster once they're ready to buy.
Employees increase their Retail Sales Skill after being assigned to Answer Customers' Questions, or to Ring Up Customers.

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} just launched an ad campaign.
Web advertising provides a quick initial rush of customers, but trails off by the end of the campaign.
TV advertising provides a consistent increase in customers for its duration. While it won't reach the same highs as web advertising, it won't drop off either.

{0.SimFirstName} just launched an ad campaign.

TV advertising provides a consistent increase in customers for its duration. While it won't reach the same highs as web advertising, it won't drop off either.

String.Source: Baking is science in action. You can't just throw random ingredients into a bowl like some chef. You have to have a plan. Fortunately, the plan involves large helpings of sugar. Increasing your baking skill will unlock new Baked Goods for your Oven and Cupcake Factory.
String.Dest: Baking is science in action. You can't just throw random ingredients into a bowl like some chef. You have to have a plan. Fortunately, the plan involves large helpings of sugar. Increasing your baking skill will unlock new Baked Goods for your Oven and Cupcake Factory.

String.Source:
Employees with the Retail Maintenance Skill will restock items faster, and will be quicker when cleaning up dirty objects or messes around the store.
Employees raise their Retail Maintenance Skill by performing their job after being instructed to Restock Sold Items or Clean.
String.Dest:
Employees with the Retail Maintenance Skill will restock items faster, and will be quicker when cleaning up dirty objects or messes around the store.
Employees raise their Retail Maintenance Skill by performing their job after being instructed to Restock Sold Items or Clean.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} is now a master of store maintenance. {M0.He}{F0.She} could now compete in restocking and cleaning competitions if such competitions existed.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} is now a master of store maintenance. {M0.He}{F0.She} could now compete in restocking and cleaning competitions if such competitions existed.

String.Source: Blink and you might miss it! {0.SimFirstName} can now restock and clean the store very quickly.
String.Dest: Blink and you might miss it! {0.SimFirstName} can now restock and clean the store very quickly.

String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName}'s pulling up {M0.his}{F0.her} bootstraps! Through {M0.his}{F0.her} hard work, {M0.he}{F0.she} can restock and clean even faster.
